title: Wilder World tops the class in Metaverse megatrend
text:
by XpTheVerse

We all know The Sandbox and Decentraland when it comes to the metaverse but there‚Äôs now a third player that has joined the conversation.

Wilder World is a fully decentralised 5D photorealistic metaverse being built on Unreal Engine 5. The project will be a community owned virtual nation with the first city being created as a 1-to-1 geographical replica of Miami which they have named Wiami.

Wiami has been developed with a futuristic vibe, reminiscent of 80s Miami, but with a CyberPunk flair and a touch of fantasy. If you have played the Blockbuster game GTA- Vice city (also based on Miami in the 80s)you should understand what they are going for.

Gaming will play a key part in this metaverse with Player vs Player (PvP) and Play to Earn (P2E) gaming. One of the first micro-games available in Wiami lets users put their skills to the test and street race Wilder Wheels vehicles around the city for NFT gains.

Property and land will be purchasable which opens up a plethora of opportunity to stake an early claim in the World.

The $WILD token is already on the market along with multiple NFT sets with future utility including the following:

¬∑ Wilder Wheels (cars),

¬∑ Wilder Crafts (flying vehicles),

¬∑ Kicks (wearable sneakers)

¬∑ Cribs.(apartments)

Some cribs have already sold as high as 39Eth! Here is the link for the Opensea collection

Can this metaverse seriously be built?

Wilder World was founded by 3D artist Frank Wilder has been in development for 7 years. With many projects claiming to be metaverses yet having been in development for much shorter times you can be confident this project is the real deal.

There should be no concerns this metaverse will be built on stock items purchased from digital asset stores as WW is being built by artists who will create originality with their work.

The world is being created by artists who are part of a Decentralised Autonomous Organisation (DAO) which in Frank Wilders words will ‚Äòcreate a project more ambitious than any single artist could do on their own‚Äô.

Frank Wilder has been called the ‚ÄòBanksy of the blockchain‚Äô and I highly recommend you check out the calibre of visuals this metaverse will have by checking out some of his insane personal 3D art here

Follow the smart money

One strong strategy in Crypto has always been to follow the smart money. There are several notable entities backing Wilder World which carry undeniable weight when investing.

¬∑ Digital Currency group (DCG) stand out from the crowd when viewing Wilder Worlds investors. Founded and led by Barry Silbert, DCG sits at the epicenter of the blockchain industry and counts one of its subsidiaries as Grayscale (the worlds largest digital assets manager). You can be assured the due diligence process carried out by an entity such as DCG is of the highest quality and can only instil much more confidence within an investor like yourself following them into a project.

¬∑ Animoca Brands the number 1 heavyweight investor in the space. If you track the projects they are partnered with you will clearly see a common theme of success.

¬∑ Jake Paul and Anti Fund was another masterstroke from the team. World famous You tuber and now boxer Jake Paul‚Äôs Anti Fund enterprise are invested in WW. He has already discussed plans to open a boxing gym in Wiami and racing his NFT Wheels in the street racing game. What else does Jake Paul bring to the table?‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ a gateway to on ramp mass adoption to the Wilder World metaverse! Imagine the exposure Jake Paul can bring with his 10s of millions of followers on social media! Check out his interview with the Wilder team.

Bad tokenomics kill a project; good tokenomics can make one

The $WILD tokenomics are healthy, show a commitment to their investors and show commitment to the growth of the metaverse ecosystem.

1. The breakdown of token distribution shows no high anomalies to any one party.

2. 50.2% of the total token supply spread across areas focused on building the community and ecosystem:

¬∑ Artist incentives 6%,

¬∑ Community Building 10%,

¬∑ partners and ecosystem 10%

¬∑ reserve 24.2%

3. The token itself holds utility as the governance token, voting rights in the DAO, staking options and to be used in the Wild ecosystem for trade.

4. An Initial public sale raise of just $250k was a great early sign of the commitment to investors over greed for grabbing money

5. The low initial market cap of $900k (Private sale and public sale) gave great growth potential for the earliest investors. Wilder World clearly put their investors first here, great sign!

6. The vesting periods for investors are gradual and staggered

7. Etherscan shows there is no one wallet holding a dangerously excessive amount that you should be concerned about.

The projects that rise to the top are the ones with the strongest communities

Imagine the feeling of being directly connected to the founders and team of a project and with them truly valuing your input in the development and evolution of it. This is how the majority of Wilder community members feel if you ask them. These behaviours from the Wilder team have instilled a contagious confidence amongst the community which has turned the majority into long term holders and ambassadors.

A community built on long term holders and not short term flippers has been proven to be the best ingredient for the long term success of a project, you can see this in the growth of projects such as Illuvium and Star Atlas for example.

The Wilder team have demonstrated consistent engagement, communication and transparency. A couple of recent examples emphasis the true nature of the Wilder team:

1. During the minting of the 501 Wilder craft NFTs there were unfortunately some failed transactions with high gas fees. Within 24 hours the Wilder team had announced to the community they had created a compensation form for anyone affected to fill out. The people affected are now having compensation claims processed. In Q1 they aim to have a layer 2 solution in place for minting to prevent this happening again.

2. An Impromptu Discord AMA was carried out by the wilder team where they actively asked for the communities‚Äô opinions and solutions on many topics. The team initiated this brainstorming session after a build up of differing opinions on strategies to complete the road map along with other short-term concerns within the community. The following day the Wilder team announced they were acting on the points discussed.

The current community has been grown completely organically with no marketing spend. As it stands now their twitter account has over 80k followers and the discord over 25k. A recent disclosure from the Wilder team is the plan to spend $2‚Äì3 million a month on marketing! No better time to join the community now before it explodes!

The most successful projects are led and driven by true visionaries

With over 100 people across 15 countries working on Wilder World you can be confident this metaverse has the means to deliver. Led by Frank Wilder a true OG creator in the space, co founders; n3o the architect, Hypno Wilder, Phoenix Wilder and marketing from Quantum Wilder all sharing the same vision.

Frank Wilder got into digital art in 2013 and minted his first NFT in 2017. Previous to the digital art he was a very successful in physical art with clients such as Justin Bieber and Kevin Durant. Frank Wilder has his own You tube channel to check out

Ex pro skateboarder turned artist Chad Knight recently left his position as Head of 3D design at Nike to join Wilder World. He has been creating some amazing wearables for the metaverse. Check out some of his work here

With such proven artistic talent and credibility amongst the creators of this metaverse, you can only imagine how visually spectacular this World has the potential to be.

How is the product shaping up

So what about the actual product? I would start by checking the following cinematic trailers

¬∑ Wilder World

¬∑ Wilder Wheels

¬∑ Wilder Cribs

¬∑ Wilder Crafts

¬∑ Wilder Wheels Tier C

The current reality of investing in these AAA projects is that some patience is needed before you can get your hands on gameplay loop footage and early access to the Alpha product.

It is still early in the project so there have only been small snippets of gameplay released at times. This is about to change with the imminent release of an Alpha version of the street racing element to selected community members. Stay tuned!

What you can check out is the AAA calibre of graphics on the NFTs currently on the market. I challenge you to find another metaverse project hitting the level of quality of these.

My thoughts as an investor

Investors in the current wave of crypto games and metaverses are putting in a lot of early trust before a minimum viable product is available for people to experience.

As a potential investor Wilder World currently sits in the above bracket. However, that said, every due diligence test myself as a researcher and investor have put it through, this project has passed with flying colours.

All roads point to the Wilder World Metaverse being the leading front runner in the 1st wave of photorealistic metaverses built on realism and not akin to the Sandbox model.

Actions you can take now!

Go watch this brilliantly informative ‚Äòcomplete guide to the Wilder World‚Äô from Wild book man on his you tube channel

Purchase Wild tokens from these exchanges

Snag yourself a set of Wilder Wheels from the WWs marketplace

Purchase Wilder World NFTs from all their collections on the secondary market

If you are looking for a more affordable investment entry point there is NFT Pet companion dropping shortly, so stay tuned with all their socials.

Come follow me on Twitter at XpTheVerse as I will be sharing Wilder World Alpha and research reports on other Metaverse and gaming projects.

Now come join the Wilder World community and share in the success of this project!

title: How to make money with the Horizon Worlds Creator Fund
text:
Horizon Worlds

Facebook recently hit the VR industry like a meteor with their announcement that they were changing their name to meta and going to be investing $10 billion into VR and their new metaverse platform, Horizon Worlds.

With this announcement was another announcement that they had created a $10 million dollar creator fund for people who were interested in becoming creators with the Horizon creator tools and making worlds for other Horizon users to visit.

But how can you dip into this pool? Information can be a bit hard to come by, but the steps are relatively simple overall. There are a few different methods.

Trending AR VR Articles:

1. Join community competitions. If you‚Äôre interested, you can sign up for more information about the $10,000 Horizon community competitions. After checking out previous winners, I believe that it wouldn‚Äôt be difficult to make a winning experience. A tip: making games requires diving deep into logic and code blocks, but if you make a relaxing ‚Äúexplore‚Äù experience it‚Äôs far easier to do.

2. Join the creator accelerator program. Details on this are a bit fuzzy, but according to people who have already joined it, payment is based on rating and popularity of the worlds that you create. The more visitors you get, the larger the payout. According to one developer in the program (who asked not to be named) his largest check was for $6200 in one month.

Before you get accepted into the creator program, it‚Äôs possible to begin making your worlds on your own. The steps for this are relatively simple as well. You need to own an Oculus Quest 1 or 2, but it‚Äôs recommended that you own a Quest 2 for the best experience. Once you have it, download Horizon Worlds from the app store. Inside, you‚Äôll need to complete a short tutorial before being able to begin creating.

The metaverse concept as a real product is brand new, but as it explodes, it‚Äôs smart to be on the front of the wave. Early adopters, especially people who are interested in creating experiences for it, will find themselves richly rewarded. Like people who learned to program in the 90s, or learned to work bronze at the end of the Iron Age, learning to use and create for VR means you‚Äôll be several steps ahead of everyone else, financially and socially.

Don‚Äôt forget to give us your üëè !

title: The Power of Experiential Learning with the Metaverse
text:
Now that we know experiential learning using moving imagery in a mistake-encouraged environment is crucial to learning new things, let‚Äôs move on to how Virtual Reality (VR) in the metaverse comes into play.

But what is the Metaverse?

The metaverse, like the universe, is a world, but unlike our universe, it‚Äôs virtual. It‚Äôs a world that‚Äôs entirely confined to the internet and is accessible through VR and AR headsets. The word ‚Äúmeta‚Äù means beyond and ‚Äúverse‚Äù comes from the universe; you can think of it as a world beyond what‚Äôs known as the universe

Virtual Reality or VR for short is the use of technology, like headsets, to create a 3D, simulated environment online.

Augmented Reality or AR for short is using technology to augment or change the environment you are already in. An example of this is a Snapchat filter; it changes your appearance, but you haven‚Äôt been transported into a new world.

Applications for VR in Learning

Photo by stem.T4L on Unsplash

Language Learning

In school, we learn a lot about writing and reading in a foreign language, but what about speaking? At least for me, the most important part of learning a foreign language is being able to actually speak it which we aren‚Äôt taught very much in the classroom. But with VR in the metaverse, instead of needing to travel to Mexico to practice your Spanish, you can become immersed in the virtual city streets, hearing authentic Spanish to practice your accent. Since two big barriers in becoming fluent in a language are geographically being immersed in the world of the language and having the confidence to speak it, in a virtual world, there‚Äôs no pressure to speak it perfectly, and it‚Äôs no big deal when you mess up.

Public Speaking Practice

Photo by Kane Reinholdtsen on Unsplash

Imagine if you could practice the exact situation of giving a speech in a no-stakes environment.

With VR, you can put on goggles and get over your fear of public speaking by practicing in an environment that feels completely real, but with no stakes.

In the metaverse, it‚Äôs ok to make mistakes, in fact, they‚Äôre encouraged! Because that‚Äôs how we learn.

One company, Virtual Speech, does just that. (But this isn‚Äôt an ad for their company!)

With the continual rise of the metaverse, practice environments, like being able to give a speech in a real-feeling but fictitious environment are becoming more widespread.

Work Training

In situations where it‚Äôs difficult for workers to ‚Äúlearn on the job‚Äù, or it‚Äôs dangerous to practice certain situations, VR can be used as a practice environment before being thrown into the real world.

An example of this is STRIVR, a B-to-B EdTech company using VR goggles for companies to train their workers. One company STRIVR worked with is Verizon to train their employees on what to do in the event of an armed robbery. Training for this specific situation is quite difficult to do safely and cost-effectively in practice, but with VR goggles, the employees can practice in an exact replica of the situation as many times as needed. If you‚Äôre curious, you can read more about STRIVR‚Äôs project with Verizon here.

Another example is in law enforcement training.

In October of 2021, the University of Cincinnati partnered with Google to test and improve a VR training program for police officers called Trainer. In Trainer, the officers are put in life-like stressful situations (in the metaverse), and they can practice their response, so they‚Äôre ready the make the right call when the situation arises in real life.

The future of VR in law enforcement training has a lot of potential going into 2022 because of the hype of the metaverse and increased tensions amongst political groups and police officers.

Accessibility for People with Disabilities

Instead of being confined to a wheelchair, the metaverse allows everyone to be on the same level and have experiences no matter your physical limitations. Maybe you want to play a game of soccer for the first time or just hang out with friends without needing special equipment; all of this is possible in the metaverse.

Starlight, a non-profit dedicated to bringing happiness to sick children, is using VR goggles to transport hospitalized kids to their favorite places around the world, allowing them to explore and learn about the world without having to leave their wheelchairs.

The Future of Education and the Metaverse

The metaverse is a huge deal.

Reality Labs by Meta (Facebook) invested $10 billion in the metaverse this past year in 2021. In addition, the metaverse is estimated to grow to a worth of $800 billion in the next three years by 2024.

Language learning, public speaking practice, work training, and accessibility for people with disabilities are just four of the hundreds of opportunities for education innovation with VR in the metaverse.

So what are you waiting for?

TL;DR: Our education system is old, outdated, and ineffective. But, using experiential learning in a mistake-encouraged environment, the metaverse has massive potential to increase student engagement and make education exceptional for our next generation of change-makers.

title: Alethea AI Year in Review: 2021
text:
A roundup of a year full of successes, from launching the Noah‚Äôs Ark Intelligent Metaverse to building a thriving community

2021 has been an incredible year for us at Alethea AI. Here‚Äôs a roundup of the year‚Äôs successes, from our token sales and partnerships, to our community growth, to releasing first of their kind collections and our Metaverse development. Let‚Äôs dive in ‚Ä¶

Image of Revenants, Pods and Alice on Noah‚Äôs Ark

Tech

Noah‚Äôs Ark Metaverse and Alethea AI Ecosystem

This year we launched Noah‚Äô Ark, the world‚Äôs first Intelligent Metaverse, which aims to preserve and evolve the culture and collective intelligence of the human species. Noah‚Äôs Ark is currently inhabited by The Revenants, Alethea AI‚Äôs own collection of the first 100 Intelligent NFTs (iNFTs). The Revenant collection features historical and cultural icons from throughout human history.

Catherine the Great: Revenant #95 ‚Äî Image Courtesy: Alethea.ai

The Noah‚Äôs Ark Metaverse gave birth to our Train-to-Earn model. The Train-to-Earn model allows iNFT owners to Earn the more that people interact with their iNFT on Noah‚Äôs Ark. People can interact with the iNFTs by using the Recite, Broadcast, or Interact feature, depending on the Intelligence Level of the iNFT. In the short time since we‚Äôve launched Noah‚Äôs Ark, we have received 3,287,691 API Requests. We have generated 847,658 videos and facilitated 112,730 interactions. There is an outstanding demand for the AI services that iNFTs offer and we expect this to grow significantly in 2022 and beyond.

Institutional Partners and Early Adopters

We felt extremely privileged and excited to receive acknowledgment and support from some of our early institutional investors, including Metapurse, Dapper Labs, Crypto.com, Multicoin, Bitkraft, Mark Cuban and many more through our $16 M private token sale.

In June, we partnered with Sotheby‚Äôs auction house and the artist Robert Alice to create and auction the world‚Äôs first-ever intelligent NFT called Alice. Alice sold for $478,800.

Image of Alice

In Oct 2021, we launched the first iNFT collection called The Revenants, which broke OpenSea records for a collection drop, netting approximately $10M in a week and skyrocketing to becoming a Top 10 collection on OpenSea in the first seven day period. The Revenants collection has a distinguished provenance for being the first-ever intelligent collectibles, a pivotal moment in the early history of NFTs.

Shortly afterwards, the iNFT Personality Pods were sold for almost 1600 ETH, becoming a Top 10 collection on Open Sea by volume. We also conducted a generous giveaway of over 1000 pods to our early adopters for participating in townhalls and AMAs.

title: Faction Spotlight: Farmers. The Farmer Faction is primarily focused‚Ä¶
text:
Each faction of the Fief guild will be assigned specific roles and responsibilities to assist in the growth of the Fief treasury and adoption of the Fief Token (FIEF) as the primary reserve currency of the entire metaverse.

In return, these Factions will benefit from the productivity of the treasury reserve and natively generated revenue from all future protocols. These incentives will stack on top of the planned, systematic buyback programs that will link the value appreciation and productivity of the treasury reserve with FIEF.

Factions work to achieve the following:

Establish an internal, gamified economy within the Fief guild to diversify the methods by which we grow the treasury reserve. This will assist in reducing the impact of broader market fluctuations on the treasury‚Äôs trajectory. Offload aspects of in-game asset utility and coordination, further decentralizing the Fief guild and token economy while allowing the core team to focus heavily on treasury management, partnerships and shipping protocols. Incentivize users to work towards building Fief as the financial center of the metaverse while establishing a hivemind to target and control markets. Add a massive layer of currency utility to the FIEF via primary NFT sales and more.

Membership to each Faction will be organized using the Initial Guild Membership (IGM) NFTs that are being sold in early Q1 2022. The initial utility of IGMs is centered around the distribution of FIEF, but in time will evolve into core membership & access tokens to specific Factions and their respective revenue streams.

This mechanism allows for upfront IGM demand from all types of crypto users (speculators, traders, metaverse natives, etc.), which will feed into a healthy secondary market for the NFTs as Faction-layer utility begins.

While users may own IGMs & other Faction-based NFTs from across all factions, we are designing our hierarchy system to reward users who concentrate their capital and time on one specific faction. Ideally, users will find factions that:

Fit within their interests and expertise Accommodate their desired level of engagement Connect with them on a community-level

In time, Faction members (and the Fief NFTs they‚Äôve acquired) will begin to represent units of value and influence within the guild ‚Äî a concept that could very well expand into sub-economies that add even more revenue to the Fief treasury and utility to FIEF.

Farmer Faction

The Farmer Faction is primarily focused on virtual worlds and the LANDs that comprise them. This Faction, which is predominantly an in-game faction, is targeted towards two types of guild members:

Speculators who are bullish on the utility and value appreciation of virtual worlds.

Hardcore gamers who want to spend their days in the metaverse.

As the most scarce assets in the metaverse, LAND will serve as a bedrock for the spread of Fief‚Äôs influence and access to recurring treasury revenue. Owning major locations across popular virtual worlds will allow Fief guild members to congregate and plan strategic expansions.

The Farmer Faction will be tasked with the following:

Populating and working key LANDs from virtual worlds across all major supported projects

Interacting with other guilds and directly with native players to facilitate the adoption of our LANDs

Maximizing resource collection while working with the Merchant & Bishop Factions to help coordinate in-game strategy for deploying those resources

In return for this activity, the Farmer Faction will receive revenue rewards from LAND productivity. These rewards will be distributed directly to staked IGM NFTs and come in a variety of forms, including Faction NFT drops, FIEF and third-party token distributions, and more.

Passive Farmer Faction IGM holders (speculators) will greatly benefit from Fief‚Äôs virtual world activities. However, the reward weighting will progressively skew towards active participants over time as we introduce Farmer Faction NFTs that reward the hardcore gamers of Fief.

With this model, even the lowest rarity IGM purchaser will be able to rise in the ranks of the Farmer Faction to gain influence and outsized rewards. To stay competitive with the more active Faction participants, the speculators will need to purchase additional NFTs to retain the reward weighting, further driving revenue to the Fief treasury reserve and growing our token economy. More details on this dynamic will be published soon.

While Farmers won‚Äôt have direct influence over LAND decision making (this is a feudal system, afterall), this Faction will work closely with the future Fief royal class and governing bodies to help make strategic decisions related to activities such as the acquisition of key buildings or other assets that will further maximize the value and/or productivity of the LAND.

Despite the majority of virtual worlds still being in development, there will undoubtedly be competitive gameplay that the Fief guild will find itself involved in. Fief is being designed as a neutral party between guilds and warring parties (we want to supply everyone with the resources ‚Äî war is highly profitable), but there may be a time in which our Farmers will need to take up arms to defend the strategic resources and LANDs that we acquire.

This will require guild-based logistics and a major part of our focus as the core Fief team will be the creation & management of the Fief coordination apparatus.

title: Metakicks by Sneakmart. Whitepaper
text:
Our story

Sneakmart is the first community-driven app dedicated to streetwear fashion. Our users can easily share, discover, buy and sell sneakers & streetwear with confidence. Launched in France in January 2021, Sneakmart regroups a community of more than 140k users.

At Sneakmart we‚Äôre passionate. We started Sneakmart for one reason and this reason is the love we have for sneakers! We‚Äôve been collecting, buying and selling sneakers for more than 15 years.

Sneaker addicts love to collect and wear a lot of sneakers. Everyone loves sneakers today (especially us), everyone wears them. With Metakicks, we want to give you the opportunity to start collecting digital sneakers through unique designs. We want to bridge the gap between collecting physical and digital sneakers.

What is Metakicks?

Metakicks is the first NFT collection of Sneakers distributed as mystery boxes. This means that when you buy a Metakicks box, you won‚Äôt know beforehand which pair of sneakers you are going to get inside. The lucky owners of these boxes will be able to choose to open them (or keep them closed) to discover which Metakicks is hidden inside. In total, 6250 Metakicks boxes will be available for purchase for this first drop.

Metakicks mystery box

Our team of sneakerheads worked hard to produce and imagine the best designs from iconic shapes and made them ready for the metaverse.

We took inspiration from areas that we love, and we used unique materials so you can have unique Metakicks that you won‚Äôt find in the real world. We created a total of 15 different designs, each design has its own theme and has been proudly created with love by our team.

These 15 designs will be randomly distributed in Metakicks boxes and are classified according to different levels of rarity: epic, super rare, rare and normal. Out of the 15 designs, there will be 1 ‚Äúepic‚Äù, 4 ‚Äúsuper rare‚Äù, 5 ‚Äúrare‚Äù and 5 ‚Äúnormal‚Äù designs, with different quantities depending on the level of rarity.

Each pair comes from a specific universe and will allow the lucky owners to stand out in the metaverse.

Our vision

Our vision is to reinvent the buying, selling, trading, and discovery of highly demanded sneakers on a global web3 community-centric level. Historically, Sneaker collectors have been localized and limited to local infrastructure. What if we could unlock trusted Sneaker e-commerce on the global stage? How much bigger could the sneaker collector‚Äôs wardrobe be? How much more impact could we make if we can bring all sneaker collectors from across the globe to connect with other sneaker communities anywhere in the world?

We are Sneakmart and we are building a world Sneaker & Streetwear collector community. Our early contributors and NFT holders will start the global take over in the digital and physical world of the empire of Sneaker collecting.

Why buy and hold?

Besides owning the very first NFT from Sneakmart, becoming a member of the Metakicks collector community holders are offered a unique combination of benefits.

Governance power in our ecosystem:

The ability to vote on which popular sneakers the community would like for Sneakmart to obtain for mystery box launches.

Exclusive access to Sneakmart only drops:

Physical sneakers will be offered to collectors in various mystery box drops.

Usable in the Metaverse (coming soon):

Metakicks holders will be able to wear them in metaverse games such as Sandbox, Decentraland or Gala games.

Access to the exclusive high-quality designer merch. Created in collaboration with our partnered influencers and brands. (sneakers, clothing, accessories, etc.)

Become a part of our social initiative to become the largest sneaker collecting community across the globe.

Physical sneaker reward

There will be 4 tiers: normal, rare, super rare, or epic. If you are lucky on top of getting a Metakicks NFT you win as a bonus, a real exclusive pair of sneakers! In total 625 limited physical sneakers will be distributed, the equivalent of $200,000 worth of sneakers.

Including :

- Jordan 1 Dior High

- Jordan 1 High Hyper Royal

- Jordan 1 High Mocha

- Jordan 1 High Patent Bred

- Jordan 1 High University Blue

- Jordan 1 Low Fragment Travis Scott

- Jordan 4 lightning, Jordan 4 shimmer, Jordan 4 University Blue

- Adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Beluga Reflective & Light

- Adidas Yeezy Slide Pure

- Nike Air Force 1 Low Supreme Black & White

- Nike Air Force 1 Low White

- Nike Dunk Low Michigan, Nike Dunk Low Team Green, Nike Dunk Low white black

- Nike Dunk Low Off White ‚ÄúLot 24‚Äù

See the full list below:

This means you have a 10% chance to win a hype physical sneaker on top of getting a unique NFT, which is more than 20x the chance you have of winning a raffle on SNKRS on hot release days. Lucky winners will be able to claim their physical reward in their own size and sneakers will be shipped internationally.

Mint Details

Metakicks is a collection of 6,250 NFTs.

Giveaways: Sneakmart will distribute 250 Metakicks mystery boxes through various giveaways found on our Discord, Twitter & Instagram. We will also send Metakicks to top influencers to bring more hype to the project.

Whitelist: If you are WL you‚Äôll be able to purchase before public launch & will receive a special discount. There will be various ways to get on the whitelist through our Twitter and socials.

Public: Public mint price will be announced soon.

We will be dropping on the Ethereum Blockchain.

1 of 1 editions for celebrities and Football players

Among the designs created by our team, there is a pair of soccer cleats ready for the Metaverse. We decided to create 1 of 1 versions of this football Metakicks featuring some of the biggest names in soccer

1 of 1 ‚ÄúDrag Rocket‚Äù Metakicks edition designed for Didier Drogba

We will reveal more 1 of 1 collaborations as we approach the drop date. These 1 of 1‚Äôs will be sold online via an auction system so everyone has a chance to bid. Holders will access different IRL advantages as signed physical items by the celebrities and IRL events.

Secrets yet to be revealed.

We have a lot more planned. You are joining a club after all and a community that is growing everyday. There will be exclusive member rewards and activities (think building a collector enterprise, airdrops, merchandise, metaverse avatars, content). But that‚Äôs all the details that we can publicly reveal for now on these‚Ä¶more information can be found in our verified holder discord channel.

title: Raise Finance IDO Tiers Explained
text:
Option 2 ‚Äî RF-Karma support mechanism (RF- Karma)

Most Eastern religions believe that karma denotes the cycle of cause and effect ‚Äî wherein every action affects the person at some point in the future. Karma also applies to your thoughts, your words, and the instructions you give other people. The RF-Karma Support Mechanism works on more or less the same principles.

The RF-Karma Support Mechanism is another way for participants to gain access to the IDO allocations, and participants here will have the opportunity to earn Karma points by staking or swapping previous tokens in exchange for IDO access. Only tokens launched by the Raise FInance team will be eligible, and this is another strong step towards boosting interest and demand for our projects. Our Raise Finance analysts conduct a detailed analysis of previously issued tokens on a periodic basis, and based on the current situation of the project, they will select tokens for the RF-Karma Support Mechanism.

How do I Earn RF-Karma Points

There are numerous ways for you to be able to earn RF-Karma points, and these have been discussed below:

Staking a specific token on Raise Finance: For every asset that you lock and stake on the RF platform, 2% is converted into RF-Karma points. This is issued once a week in the form of weekly karma and expires every month.

For every asset that you lock and stake on the RF platform, 2% is converted into RF-Karma points. This is issued once a week in the form of weekly karma and expires every month. Trading a specific token on Raise Finance: For every asset that you trade through Raise Finance, 2% is converted to RF-Karma points. This is issued once a week in the form of weekly karma and expires every month.

For every asset that you trade through Raise Finance, 2% is converted to RF-Karma points. This is issued once a week in the form of weekly karma and expires every month. Successfully submitting projects to Raise finance hackathons: For every successful project that you submit, you will earn 100 RF-Karma points that expire after 14 weeks.

*The specific conditions around the conversion may vary from project to project.

The top 250 wallets in each case that have the most RF-Karma points will gain access to IDO allocations.

The top 150 wallets from this will be part of Pool 1 and will share 70% of the total share.

The top 100 wallets from this will be part of Pool 2 and will share 30% of the total share.

Example

For example, if a Project ABC manages to raise a total of $200,000.

According to the pool weight distribution, the amount allocated to the RF-Karma Support Mechanism is

Total raise * 0.20 (PW)= 40 000$

Therefore, each pool gets allocated funds as follows:

Pool 1 = 40,000$ * 0.70 = 28 000$

Pool 2 = 40,000$ * 0.30 = 12 000$

Pool 1 and Pool 2 participants will get a guaranteed allocation proportionally depending on the earned points.

title: Index Coop ‚Äî The Why, What & How.
text:
When it comes to crypto, there is nothing but a fine line between value investing and speculating. Especially like the market situation we are in now where random projects are pumping or dumping fueled by hypes & trends.

Not all of us have the time or the expertise to #DYOR on every new project. But we can‚Äôt also just go around parking our money in the random 100x meme token your favorite social media influencer shilled to you. That would be a disaster.

We the people are in need of a solid product, that helps users invest in good projects in this space and do that so, in a systemic and user-friendly manner. Such products are brought to you by Index Coop ‚Äî The #1 Crypto Index Fund Manager.

what is an index fund?

Index funds are financial instruments that track the performance of an index/bucket of assets rather than a single asset. The advantage of investing in a bucket of assets rather than a few selective assets is healthy diversification. ‚Äúdon‚Äôt put all your eggs in one basket‚Äù, they say.

Index funds come with a huge potential to risk aversion. even if few assets in the basket perform badly or even go under, the investor of the index will relatively be in a safer position as his gains from other assets in the basket balanced the losses from underperforming assets.

Even though it diminishes returns to an extent, we can‚Äôt argue against the fact that such projects are even more necessary in the wild west crypto market than in traditional markets, Because in crypto there are hundreds of choices, dramatic price swings, and a market that never sleeps.

What is index coop?

Index Coop builds simple yet powerful index products to help you access crypto investment themes.

Their mission is to create a better way for people to join the crypto revolution. They are trying to do what traditional index funds helped retails investors to achieve, to grow their wealth in a stable way.

Index Coop has theme-based crypto index products, so the user has more freedom in choosing which type of asset their investment will be tracking, given that there are too many assets in crypto and it is hard to put them in one category.

Let me shill you some of their products!

Defi Pulse Index (DPI)

The Defi pulse index (DPI) tracks the performance of the top Defi project‚Äôs tokens. A single DPI token tracks the performance of all these Defi projects based on the weightage given to each project. The weightage depends on the circulating supply of each token.

Currently, these are tokens tracked under DPI.

The tracked assets are well picked that they have to have some predefined characteristics for them to be tracked in Defi Pulse Index.

The Token must be an ERC-20 Standard.

It should be related to Dapps listed on Defi Pulse.

The token must be decentralized enough so that it won‚Äôt be defined as a security.

Wrapped tokens, Tokenized derivatives, and Synthetic assets will not be considered for the index

Along with that the projects circulating supply, potential use cases, adoption, demand, age, and such metrics are verified before adding it to DPI.

DPI is an amazing choice for people who wants to get exposure to the growth potential that Defi applications create. Imagine buying into DPI before the Defi Summer of 2020.

Metaverse Index (MVI)

The Metaverse Index (MVI) tracks the performance of top metaverse projects. A single MVI token tracks the performance of all these Metaverse projects based on the weightage given to each project. Here weightage is determined by the market cap and liquidity of the token.

Currently, these are tokens tracked under MVI.

The tracked assets are well picked that they have to have some predefined characteristics for them to be tracked in Metaverse Index.

The token must be an ERC-20 Standard.

The project should be listed in coingecko in any of these categories ‚Äî Non-Fungible Tokens, Entertainment, Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, and Music.

The protocol must have at least 3 months history of operation and the token must have at least 3 months of price and liquidity history (must also have considerable Ethereum DEX liquidity).

Along with that, the project‚Äôs security audit will be considered before including it into MVI.

MVI is the go-to product to get exposure to the growth potential created by the new metaverse craze in the market (MVI did a 10x run from the lowest point this year, after the metaverse craze started by Facebook rebranding itself Meta).

Bankless BED Index

Bankless BED Index took a unique approach to create an index product that is soo wholesome covering the three major themes of crypto ‚Äî Store of value, Programmable money & Decentralized finance with equal weightage.

A single BED token tracked the performance of Wrapper Bitcoin, Wrapped Ether & Defi pulse index (DPI) with equal weightage.

For a project to be included in BED,

It must have a market cap above $25B.

the protocol must be widely used either as a network or as a smart contract platform.

the asset must have sufficient liquidity for initial inclusion and further rebalances.

ETH 2x Flexible Leverage Index & BTC 2x Flexible Leverage Index

These are cool index products that track the performance of the 2x leveraged positions of those respective assets. This is extremely useful for leverage traders who take collateralized loans to leverage their positions.

When the market faces sudden negative volatility, the chances of the collateralized loans getting liquidated to cover the position are high. Using ETH 2x-FLI or BTC 2x-FLI, the users don‚Äôt have to manage or monitor their leveraged position, any action required to avoid liquidation like rebalancing collateral will be done by index managers. Users can just get the benefits of a 2x leverage position at ease.

It internally uses cETH as collateral to get a USDC loan and uses the USDC to buy more ETH. the debt & collateral is accessed through compound finance.

Note: ETH 2x-FLI is also available in polygon, we don't have to worry about high ETH Gas fees while buying it.

Data Economy Index (DATA)

Data Economy Index (DATA) tracks the performance of data-oriented new-age blockchain projects. This is another avenue in which blockchain is trying to revolutionize the existing system.

Currently, all our data is controlled by the big tech monopolies whose track records call for attention to its ethical standards on how it uses user data.

Currently, these are the tokens tracked under DATA,

title: Community-Driven DogCoin NFT Gaming Experience
text:
CollarQuest

CollarQuest is a community-organized NFT Gaming Experience powered by CollarToken ($COLLAR). CollarQuest is a game based on the story of robot dogs called SPARC-E (Sentient Programmable Assault & Reconnaissance Canine-Entity). SPARC-Es are NFTs with random characteristics, abilities, and skills. These NFTs can be played, sold, or transferred in and out of the game.

The game takes place in Ariomont, the SPARC-E homeland. Ariomont is divided into tokenized plots of land which act as homes and bases for their SPARC-E. Plots can be upgraded over time using various in-game resources and crafting ingredients. Landowners can also find $TAG tokens or SPARC-Es on their plot of land, and use them to explore further.

There is also a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) behind CollarQuest, which means the community hodlers influence the actions of the project. The project is very community-oriented and infuses purpose, utility, and direction into the DAO. All developments, roadmaps, and opportunities are planned with the community‚Äôs input in mind.

Tokenomics

CollarQuest‚Äôs main token is $COLLAR, and is supported by their governance token, $TAG. TAG is still going through their tokenomics review, but its goals are to provide a market-competitive incentive for staking and farming of $COLLAR and $TAG to receive rewards. $GeM is another one of their supporting tokens, which can be used for in-game purchases, breeding, and upgrades.

The tokenomics behind COLLAR include a 95% return to treasury and reserves that are under the control of CollarQuest DAO HODL. $COLLAR is an ETH- and MATIC-powered token available for purchase on Quickswap and ShibaSwap.

The contract addresses for all three tokens are as follows:

Collar Contract Address

ETHERSCAN: 0x9783b81438c24848f85848f8df31845097341771

POLYGON: 0xd5fa77a860fea9cff31da91bbf9e0faea9538290

Tag Contract Address

ETHERSCAN: 0x7797c85b46f548eacc07c229f6cd207d6370442f

POLYGON: 0x8a6F1738b2Ff63C7C29F7E2B0073D96C839b0B23

GeM Contract Address

ETHERSCAN: 0xebc27d9bd8ac268934784dcdf1eaa10dfaf97a9f

POLYGON: 0x2f911F789d9D599B34D403a2cFc0C5B3f7E8cE7a

CollarQuest Academy

In the game, a CollarQuest Manager (a player who has enough SPARC-E) can seek a cadet (someone who doesn't have enough SPARC-E) to play the game for them using their SPARC-E. The Genesis Mechanism ($GeM) earned by the cadet will then be split between the manager and the cadet based on their agreed-upon split.

CollarQuest NFT Marketplace

CollarToken also just had a recent announcement where they gave an update and walkthrough of their CollarQuest NFT Marketplace.

Dog Collar Token and CollarQuest are part of TAG DAO LLC. TAG DAO LLC is a Wyoming USA Limited Liability Company, Sub Type Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) file # 2021‚Äì001042843 with a Perpetual term with an effective date of October 13, 2021.

Join the Collar Crew

Discord: https://t.co/hzKSbLTMd1

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DogCollarToken

Telegram: https://t.me/DogCollarCrew

Thanks to CollarToken for sponsoring this article. Check out their website if you want to learn more about the project and join the #collarcrew. This is not financial advice. Please do your own research before investing in any project. Make sure to subscribe to the VoskCoin YouTube Channel to stay up to date on the latest cryptocurrency news and reviews.

title: What‚Äôs Your Financial Plan for The Metaverse?
text:
What‚Äôs Your Financial Plan for The Metaverse?

The Collins Dictionary declared NFT ( short fornon-fungible commemorative) its word of the time ‚Äî and similar commemoratives form a crucial part of the burgeoning virtual macrocosm. Everyone from gamers to inventors to diplomats feel eager to get into the metaverse before this interpretation of the future arrives.

Still, should you have a fiscal plan for it? Rare will be the mainstream counsel who tells you to drop$ 1, If the future is the metaverse.5 million on a many plots of digital land. And the jury is still out on how and if the metaverse can indeed take shape.

But as we wind down this time of meta mania, it would be prudent at least to have some sense of the ways this new means of working, playing and investing might affect your budget.

At the same time, you will know what to say when someone in your family inevitably asks you, over the sheets of paper, ‚ÄúWhat is metaverse, anyway?‚Äù.

Investments in Digital Means: A virtual macrocosm creates virtual investment openings. Digital land prices are roaring. Republic Real Estate, a establishment that has raised plutocrat to buy worried condos in the physical world, launched a fund before this time aimed at investors seeking to buy virtual land. The adventure plans to buy parcels across several online ‚Äú metaverses‚Äù and develop them into virtual hospices, stores and other uses, with the thing of adding their value among cryptocurrency suckers.

Of course, NFT art has come one of the buzziest digital means this time. And Thomas Olsen, a mate at Bain &Co., lately said he sees all means being tokenized 20 or 30 times in the future. ‚Äú All stocks, all bonds are going to be on a digital asset platform that is being erected by the crypto testing moment,‚Äù he said.

Online-Only Shopping and Gests: Online shopping will get indeed more complicated if brands have their way. They‚Äôre formerly making millions of bones dealing apparel and accessories that live only in the metaverse. It might feel silly now, but the way you look online could start to matter a lot further if important of your work and play take place there. That‚Äôs why it‚Äôll be important to keep track of how and why incorporations of different races and genders get priced online. The difference are formerly starting to show up, and the counteraccusations could be serious.

Remote Work to the Extreme: Telling someone that they demanded to prepare for the internet to disrupt their assiduity might have sounded portentous and indeed silly in 1990, but clearly not in retrospection. Is it possible that the same can be said for the metaverse?

The meta modus operandi could make remote work more endless and immersive. Facebook wants to bring its interpretation of the office to the virtual world, but so too does the big kahuna in plant technology Microsoft. A interpretation of Microsoft‚Äôs Brigades converse and conferencing program that features digital incorporations is in testing now and will be available in the first half of 2022. Guests will be suitable to partake Office lines and features, like PowerPoint balconies, in the virtual world.

Shifting Circumstances in the Real World: None of this is to say that the real world is going to vanish anytime soon. (Although occasionally it feels that way.) As cryptocurrency, gaming, work and everyday life combine, however, enterprises will continue to acclimatize in the real world.

One illustration We might start to see companies change locales to real- world authorities viewed as further friendly to the virtual bone. That formerly seems to be passing in Puerto Rico, whose low levies have been attracting the crypto crowd indroves.However, fine, If the metaverse‚Äôs bankers want to gather in San Juan. But I ‚Äôll be cataloging interviews with them at the sand, not online.

title: Angel Vision
text:
(Makalenin T√ºrk√ße versiyonu)

I have been in the start-up sector for a long time with my Edimly start-up. I haven‚Äôt realized until today that we had provided no information about the vision and mission of our company on our website which I make all the marketing-related decisions on my own. Here, I will try to share my views about it.

The secret in us

Today, most of our actions are willingly or unwillingly recorded thanks to numerous devices around us. For example, a wearable technology product transfers how much we ran on the beach in the early hours of the morning and our heart rate to a digital world. But no one knows about the beautiful girl you saw when you ran on the beach and that tingly feeling that the morning sun created on that girl‚Äôs face. And think about listening to ‚ÄúAngel of The Morning‚Äù by Juice Newton from a streaming service like Spotify which turned all people into their target audience. Spotify probably noticed that you turned down the volume when you passed that girl but there is no such device to perceive our mood and transfer it to Spotify. It is a fact that all of these services which we register and send important or trivial information without noticing often use this data to show us ads. All they do is to show us what we have listened to the most at the end of the year and give us stupid pleasure. But at least they won‚Äôt know the pleasure we have, right? They might try to guess what we feel at that moment from our gestures but they will never know what is happening inside us ‚ò∫Ô∏è

From Hello World to Big Data

I might have associated the company that address as ‚Äúthem‚Äù and the service the company provides. The vision is the targeted position of the company in the future while the mission is the steps taken to make that vision come true. Based on this definition, I don‚Äôt think it is wrong to say that ‚Äúthe mission of a company is the services it offers‚Äù. Then, we cannot deny the fact that these companies are willing to collect all the necessary and unnecessary data despite all the costs because of their vision to exploit us. In recent years, I frequently encounter people saying, ‚ÄúThey are listening to us!‚Äù If only they knew that these companies are following us in various ways from the first days of the internet, they would understand that they do not see Cyprus ads because they are talking about Cyprus. It is not that hard to blend existing data with psychology and use artificial intelligence to make such recommendations. Although it is not commonly mentioned in recent years, Data Mining which is one of my main reasons to admire Google since I was a young boy is an extremely important branch. As someone who is curious about experiencing everything, I was able to do some interesting analysis as a kid by using the big data stolen from huge platforms (of course public data).

Hello New World?

I am unable to be included in the Metaverse trend which can be seen in the news of partisan media as someone who is curious about experiencing everything. But I have used both VR and AR glasses for a long time. If this hardware will enable us to access the Metaverse universe, it is not possible to predict that Metaverse will be a hit. When we all asked ‚Äúis it sensible to pay 1 billion dollars‚Äù when Facebook acquired Instagram, we all witnessed that this platform worked out well years later. If an old man in G√∂nen can sell cheese today through a platform established only for sharing artistic pictures, that platform be a hit, man. But it is important to remember that the environment was suitable for Instagram to reach this power. When we look at the current conditions, Metaverse is weak in various terms and I don‚Äôt think it will be a hit unless it finds something innovative.

We are ruling this planet as humanity for a long time and there are even undiscovered places on the planet. For me, the only reason to create a new virtual environment despite such a large planet is commercial. This is nothing different than those who sold lands from other planets. Anyway‚Ä¶ We still have a planet waiting to be discovered and a digital model designed with every detail. What bothers me is that for some reason, we use this map only to get directions to a location and to find out the location of our relatives.

Loneliness on the Map

On contrary to the Metaverse trend, I believe that we don‚Äôt need to create a new world yet. Instead of creating a new world, I would like to add color (üß°) to the existing world. I will try to explain how I will do that with an example. Let‚Äôs go back to our guy running on the beach as I have mentioned in the beginning. But this time, let‚Äôs assume he installs Edimly before starting the run. He opens Edimly and sees that the girl he encounters every day but is unable to speak is marked as ‚Äúrunning‚Äù. He sends a request ‚Äúshall we do it together‚Äù and they start walking together when the girl accepts. As you can see, we helped the love life of this young man. So, can we say that Edimly is a need? If we consider what Steve Jobs and similar entrepreneurs did until today, ABSOLUTELY! Edimly‚Äôs structure is suitable for everything. I don‚Äôt know if it will work if you want to sell refrigerators to the Eskimos. But I realize this one thing. When I open Google Maps and see myself alone, I feel like something is missing. I want to fill the maps with living beings breathing like us and acting like us instead of immovable assets like spaces. How clear can I be about Edimly‚Äôs vision and mission?

title: Top 5 most watched eSports events of 2021
text:
In terms of viewership, 2021 marked the year of breaking new records and taking eSports games to new levels of popularity.

Whether it‚Äôs traditional games steadily developing a fanbase or mobile cybersport continuing its growth, this year many cybersport tournaments attracted more than 1 million viewers ‚Äî 22 events. Looking ahead to the end of 2021, we take a look at the top 5 most watched cybersport events (excluding the Chinese audience).

Most viewed events of 2021

5th place ‚Äî The International 10 and PGL Major Stockholm 2021 (2.74m)

5th place went to 2 tournaments at once, from Valve in different disciplines.

Dota 2 ‚Äî The International 10. The event was Dota 2‚Äôs most successful eSports event in the game‚Äôs history. The peak audience was 2.74 million viewers, who spent more than 107 million hours watching the tournament broadcasts. If to analyse which teams were popular at TI10, Team Spirit proved to be the most watched (in terms of average viewership). The Russian eSports team was watched by an average of 805,216 viewers. It was followed by PSG.LGD (767,762), Team Secret (561,481) and OG (517,908).

CS:GO ‚Äî PGL Major Stockholm 2021. The first Major in two years did not disappoint viewers, becoming the most-watched tournament in the discipline. The peak viewership was 2.74 million. After VALORANT entered the eSports scene, many began to wonder, ‚Äúwhat will happen to CS:GO?‚Äù But the huge interest in the game, during the PGL Major Stockholm 2021 tells us that CS:GO will definitely succeed.

4th place ‚Äî M3 World Championship (3.19m)

The huge rise in popularity of mobile and the incredible success of the M3 World Championship, brought the game Mobile Legends: Bang Bang a peak of 3.19 million viewers. Fans spent 62.61 million hours watching the tournament. This result proves, not for the first time, that in the near future, mobile eSports will be able to completely push out PC eSports in terms of viewership.

3rd place ‚Äî PUBG Mobile Global Championship Season 0 (3.8m)

Although PUBG Mobile Global Championship Season 0 started in November 2020, it made the list thanks to the fact that it finished and peaked in January 2021, recording an impressive 3.8 million viewers.

The average viewership of the game was 528,000 in 122 hours of broadcast. In terms of peak viewership, the tournament performed best in the Indonesian (2.12 million), Arabic (494,393) and Russian (415,412) regions.

2nd place ‚Äî League of Legends 2021 World Championship (4.01m)

The 2021 League of Legends World Championship saw an incredible peak audience of 4.01 million viewers (excluding the Chinese audience). It is by far the most-watched tournament and the first eSports tournament to draw more than 4 million viewers.

The tournament also holds the record for the most hours watched in the history of eSports tournaments (174.82 million).

1st place ‚Äî Free Fire World Series 2021 Singapore (5.41m)

The most watched cybersport event of 2021, is the Free Fire World Series 2021 Singapore. The mobile game garnered 5.41 million viewers at its peak and 2.08 million viewers on average in its short broadcast time.

Free Fire World Series 2021 Singapore is currently not only the most watched cybersport event of 2021 but also the most-watched ever.

It will be interesting to see if the mobile cybersport trend continues, or if PC games can compete for supremacy in 2022.

title: Treadmill vs Cycling: Which Is Better? Indian Arena
text:
When it comes to working out, people have a lot of different opinions on which is the best way to go. Some people swear by treadmill workouts, while others prefer cycling.

So, which is really better?

Let‚Äôs take a look at the pros and cons of each to find out!

Advantages of Treadmill

1. More comfortable

If you have a bad back, knees, hips or ankles, a running surface is probably going to be more comfortable for you than a seat on a stationary bicycle.

2. More variety

A treadmill is an open platform, so there‚Äôs usually more of a selection on what kind of running workouts you can do (interval training, hill training, etc.).

3. Preferred by elite athletes

Although both treadmill and cycling workouts are common among elite athletes, bicycling appears to be more popular among elite athletes.

This could be because you can hook up a treadmill to a video game console, while it‚Äôs hard to do that with a stationary bicycle.

4. Track your progress

Most treadmills come with a monitor that tracks your time, distance and calories burned.

5. Not as harsh on the knees

This might be marginal, but it is widely believed that running on a treadmill is less harsh on the joints than running outside.

6. Leave the machine behind

While this is obviously true for running, it can also be said for cycling. This means you won‚Äôt have to drive anywhere, and you can work out at your convenience.

Disadvantages of Treadmill

1. Not safe

Because the belt is running under your feet, there‚Äôs always the possibility of tripping or slipping on the treadmill if you need to get off quickly.

2. Less of a cardiovascular workout

Due to the fact that you‚Äôre not getting an elevated heart rate, workouts on a treadmill are typically not as good for burning fat.

3. Not as challenging

It‚Äôs easier to run on a treadmill than it is to ride a bike, making spinning your wheels much more challenging than running in place.

4. No scenery

If you‚Äôre using a treadmill, the only scenery you‚Äôll be able to see is your own four walls. Riding a bicycle outside offers beautiful views and fresh air.

5. Not as motivating

Many runners like to be able to see the road and world around them while they workout, and if that isn‚Äôt possible on a treadmill it can take away from your motivation somewhat.

Thankfully, new technology has created televisions that go in front of treadmills, offering a way to view your favourite shows while you‚Äôre getting in shape.

Advantages of Cycling

Elevate your heart rate

Cycling is a great way to elevate your heart rate and burn fat.

2. Great for the cardiovascular system

Cycling is also a fantastic form of aerobic exercise, meaning it‚Äôs good for your heart and lungs.

3. A total body workout

Because cycling offers a variety of different exercises, you can work out every part of your body and still get a great cardiovascular workout.

4. Low impact

Because you‚Äôre on a saddle, cycling is easier on the joints than running is.

5. Great for people with injuries

If you have had an injury to your legs or hips, cycling may be a better way for you to exercise than running as it puts less pressure on those areas.

6. Leave the machine behind

If you‚Äôre a runner as well as a cyclist, this is obviously not going to apply to you, but for those who only cycle it‚Äôs true.

No need to go anywhere or hook up any equipment ‚Äî just hop on your bicycle and off you go!

Since cycling can be more of a functional type of exercise, it‚Äôs also a good idea to invest in a bike that can easily be brought along with you on vacations or when visiting friends.

Disadvantages of Cycling

1. Harsh on the joints

Cycling is difficult on your knees and hips, especially if you‚Äôre going uphill. Running may not be easy for you, but it‚Äôs definitely less taxing on the joints than cycling is.

2. Less of a cardiovascular workout

You don‚Äôt get as elevated of a heart rate as you do when running which means that biking isn‚Äôt always as good for burning fat.

3. Harder to track your progress

Stationary bicycles and spin bikes will usually come with a monitor that tracks your time, distance and calories burned, but you won‚Äôt be able to do that if you‚Äôre outside or commuting on your bike.

What‚Äôs the best exercise to lose weight?

For those looking to lose weight, cycling and running are both great options.

Think of it this way: If you‚Äôre looking to lose weight, you need to burn more calories than you take in.

Since cycling requires no special equipment, you can simply ride your bike to burn calories. If you‚Äôre looking for resistance training, running is a good option as well since it includes strength training.

Both running and cycling are great total body workouts, so if you‚Äôre someone who is looking for a way to exercise every part of your body, you should try both and see which you like better.

If you only care about burning calories and losing weight, go for cycling since it‚Äôs a great form of aerobic exercise and targets your lower body.

If you‚Äôre looking to tone up and add strength training to your routine, running is a good option for you.

Conclusion ‚Äî Which is Better?

As we can see from this article there are many advantages and disadvantages to both methods of exercise.

Treadmills would seem like the better option as it may be more effective at burning fat than cycling, but it is also much harder on the joints.

Cycling seems like the better option because it could be a more effective cardiovascular workout but it is also much harder on the joints.

It seems that both have their pros and cons, which is why it‚Äôs important to make a decision based on your personal goals, abilities and interests.

title: Cricket Star Manager: A P2E Game Built for 2.5 Billion People
text:
Cricket Star Manager

Over the past year, interest in play-to-earn (P2E) games has skyrocketed, powered by the explosive growth of cryptocurrency and NFTs. Games industry heavyweights, such as EA and Ubisoft believe P2E games are the future of gaming and with a gaming industry that is already worth upwards of $175 billion, combined with a P2E gaming market currently worth ~$32 billion and a crypto industry valued at ~$2.5 trillion‚Ä¶ you‚Äôve got yourself a genuine revolution in the way people play, earn, and connect.

A Cricket P2E Game?

Cricket is the predominant sport in over 17 countries including India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, the United Kingdom and Australia. The total addressable population is over 2.5 billion followers across the globe, making it the world‚Äôs second most popular sport. Cricket is so popular that there has twice been over one billion people simultaneously watching the ICC Cricket World Cup, in 2015 and 2019.

The cricket industry has an annual valuation of ~$2 billion, with this figure increasing at a blistering pace with the further digitisation of sport and the reopening of the world, post-pandemic. The media rights for India‚Äôs IPL were recently valued at $5 billion for the next five-year cycle, a clear indication of the financial potential of the cricket industry.

The Cricket Star Manager team is composed of both gaming and blockchain industry veterans, including the founders of Gold Town Games. By tapping into the experience and success of their previous title, World Hockey Manager, with over two million downloads and over 100 million matches played, our team is creating a P2E game that will target a huge, overlooked niche and a massive fan base, while giving our users not just a great gaming experience but also the ability to earn real rewards for playing.

Introducing Cricket Star Manager

Cricket Star Manager is a fully featured sports management simulator, built on the Unity engine.

As a player in Cricket Star Manager, you create your own cricket team, starting in the lowest leagues alongside other beginners and just like in the real world, you can try to climb the divisions and compete for the highest title in your country. If you are successful in conquering your country, you can fight to be the number one cricket team in the world and enjoy all the spoils that come along with being the number one Cricket Star Manager!

Players stake and earn Cricket Buck ($CRIX) to participate in the game and when a cricket match is finished, $CRIX are split and distributed among the winning team, the stadium owner, and the spectators who supported the winning team. Using your winnings, you can draft new players to your roster, acquire legendary players/items and even a stadium to host games yourself.

Cricket Star Manager NFTs

Players

Each cricket player NFT on a team is different: speed, strength, stamina, and accuracy stats are all differentiators (the higher, the rarer), each generated as a NFT, which can level up, increasing their stats and abilities. When teams win matches, they win the game‚Äôs in-game currency which is used to evolve their players and team to higher levels (leveling up). Cricket player NFTs that reach a certain level can be bought and sold through the marketplace.

Once Cricket Star Manager is launched, player NFTs showing real cricket players will also be added to the game through licensing deals with leagues, clubs and individual players.

In learning from mistakes made in other NFT-games‚Äô economies, specifically a constant inflation of game assets, Cricket Star Manager‚Äôs economy introduces elements of deflation (for example, retiring cricket players at a certain age etc.).

Stadiums

Skilled players in the game will have the opportunity to transform their basic cricket field into a stadium. Stadiums are issued as NFTs and owners can host games, tournaments, and special events, collecting fees from games played in their stadiums. A stadium can also be rented out to other players. Stadiums can also evolve over time, increasing their potential to host games and subsequently growing the player‚Äôs income.

When not hosting games, a player‚Äôs stadium is used for training the user‚Äôs cricket players, growing their experience during idle time thus increasing their skill and value.

Cricket Star Manager Tokens ($CSM and $CRIX)

Cricket Star Manager utilizes two tokens, $CSM and $CRIX.

$CSM is the premium and governance token with a fixed supply of 100 million. Token holders can stake $CSM to govern the community treasury, increase their asset values and affects how they earn these assets via gameplay. Owning $CSM opens access to exclusive NFT drops and sales. Early $CSM token holders will also receive $CRIX in the $CRIX Genesis drop.

$CRIX is the in-game currency and players earn $CRIX, by leveling up, winning matches, watching games etc. $CRIX can be spent to draft new players, train cricket players and speed up events, such as recovery from injuries. All transactions made in the P2P market will require $CRIX and users will be able to trade $CRIX for fiat currency through exchanges.

The Future of Cricket Star Manager

Considering the incredible potential of P2E games and the popularity of cricket around the world, Cricket Star Manager is poised to bring the best of both worlds. Not only will this game offer players an enjoyable and addictive gameplay experience, it also enables an additional, potentially life changing income stream for thousands of people in India, Bangladesh, and surrounding developing countries where cricket is massively popular.

The sports manager genre in the game industry is known for loyal players who can remain active for many years and by including P2E game mechanics, user retention will be multitudes higher as players can truly own their own teams‚Ä¶and receive all the benefits of doing so!

The team at Cricket Star Manager is determined to become one of the top 10 employers/income providers in India by 2023, and prove that gaming is much more than just a fun pastime.

More details about the game, public sale and timelines will be released soon. In the meantime we invite you to join us on this journey via our social channels listed below.

Official Links for Cricket Star Manager

Website: https://www.cricketstarmanager.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/CricketStarMngr

Telegram Group: https://t.me/cricketstarmanager

Telegram ANN: https://t.me/csm_ann

Discord: https://discord.gg/RzPhVSGgd8
