title: NFTs on Solana ‚Äî The Basics. What is an NFT?
text:
EXTERNAL METADATA & ‚ÄòOFF-CHAIN‚Äô MEDIA CONTENT

The Universal Resource Identifier (URI) provides the location of an external JSON file containing additional metadata. The external JSON file will include metadata such as a URL (website link) to the media asset & a description of the asset including any associated attributes.

The media asset itself is typically stored ‚Äòoff-chain‚Äô on a decentralized permaweb storage app like Arweave, or a centralized web server like Amazon Web Services (AWS). The media asset may additionally be hosted on a content delivery network (CDN) to provide faster load times.

The URL website link to an external location where the media asset is stored is included in the JSON file. The following file formats for media assets are supported:

Image ‚Äî PNG, GIF, JPG

Video ‚Äî MP4, MOV

Audio ‚Äî MP3, FLAC, WAV

VR ‚Äî 3D models; GLB, GLTF

HTML pages

It is important to note that NFTs are tokens on the blockchain tagged with metadata that essentially ‚Äòpoint‚Äô to an external location (off-chain) where the media asset is actually stored. The non-fungible token proves ownership of the media asset & keeps a record of its transactional history. Wallets (& other apps) pull both the on-chain metadata and any external metadata through the URI field to display all relevant info.

Read more about Arweave below!

title: How Are Foreign Exchange Rates Determined?
text:
The Forex market is huge. Every day, trillions of dollars are traded to meet the ever-changing demand for different currencies on a moment by moment basis. This trade reflects not only the shifting sands of geopolitical architecture that denotes a currency‚Äôs value, but also the actions of traders, consumers, businesses and middlemen who are engaged in currency swaps for pleasure, pragmatism, or profit.

Fixed and Floating Rates

The foreign exchange rates you see when you go to buy your travel money are directly influenced by the Forex market chugging away in the background. These numbers are not arbitrary, but how are they arrived at?

Currencies fall into two main categories when it comes to their exchange rate. Some currencies have a floating rate, while others have a fixed rate.

What Are Floating Exchange Rates?

A floating currency exchange rate is where the value of the currency can rise and fall in line with market demands, supply, and geopolitical pressures. Major examples include the US dollar and the British pound. Floating currency rates have been the norm for most of the world since the collapse of the Bretton Woods system and the unlatching from the gold standard.

What Are Fixed Exchange Rates?

A fixed currency exchange rate is where the value of the currency is pegged to another currency and tracks the value of another currency. Major examples include the Chinese Yuan and Saudi Arabian Riyal, which are pegged to the value of the U.S Dollar.

For example, to ensure that the Chinese RMB maintains its rough peg to the US dollar, the central bank buys dollars with the home currency when the currency rises in value, and sells dollars when the currency falls in value, artificially increasing or decreasing the supply of dollars so the government can keep the peg where it wants it to be. This infuriates the American government, as it unbalances the trade deficit between the countries unnaturally. However, the Chinese government is, now, very slowly transitioning from this long-held policy in order to let the Yuan start to float.

Are Floating Currencies Truly Floating?

Most currencies in the world are notionally floating. Why notionally? Because although national governments allow the currency‚Äôs value to morph appropriately in response to market forces, central banks have frequently, throughout history, taken measures to prop up the price of the currency in the face of damaging headwinds or prevent its appreciation in light of surging market desire.

For example, the Swiss Franc ‚Äî in light of the 2008 financial crisis when capital flight took refuge in their banking sector ‚Äî had further appreciation stunted by the government‚Äôs purchase of US dollars and Euros. On the other side of the equation, the Japanese Yen underwent government-led devaluation through the purchase of US treasury bonds by their central bank.

However, with floating exchange currencies, governments generally seek only to influence, not affect, the price of the currency through various policies. With fixed exchange rate currencies like the Yuan, this kind of activity can happen regularly.

The Key Factors that Influence Exchange Rates

With floating exchange rate currencies, there are several key factors that influence the value of currency.

Interest Rates

One of these is the interest rate paid by the central bank to holders of the currency in the form of government bonds. Central banks which borrow money issue bonds with a specific interest rate, and that rate is one of the core determinants of a currency‚Äôs value. The higher the interest rate, the more investors are keen to buy, swap for, and hold the country‚Äôs currency and store it to receive the rate, which makes the currency more valuable.

Money Supply

Another factor is the money supply. When facing economic difficulties, countries often print money (called Quantitative Easing) in order to prop up shortfalls in economic activity. This sudden explosion of money supply can have deleterious effects on the value of the currency on the foreign exchange market. It makes sense, the higher the supply, the less the value of each individual unit.

Rampant inflation, whether by natural economic activity or ill-judged economic policy, results in currency devaluation. Bitcoin has risen so startlingly in value not only because of its inherent properties (like a limited supply), but also being used as a ‚Äòflight to safety‚Äô due to the unprecedented rate of money printing by the Federal Reserve as it flushes more dollars into the economy ‚Äî either to prop it up from economic shock or to facilitate government spending on a grand scale. Recent Central Banking actions are partly responsible for an increase in public distrust and the proliferation of cryptocurrencies, including decentralised stablecoins, which are on-chain assets pegged to the value of fiat currencies like the US Dollar..

PPP and the Law of One Price

Another factor in a currency‚Äôs exchange rate is the purchasing power parity (PPP) and the ‚Äòlaw of one price‚Äô. In theory, a good (such as a Big Mac) in one country should cost the same as it does in another, as it consists of the same elements. However, due to factors like transportation costs, transaction costs, legal issues, the buyers and sellers in a market, alongside myriad other factors, this does not often hold in practice ‚Äî and the value of a currency shifts as a result.

Investor Faith

Finally, and far more nebulously, currency value is determined by the overall economic health and stability of the issuing country. Economic growth, productivity improvements and overall faith in a countries legal, financial and political systems all contribute to a higher valued currency as investors are confident that the country will both meet its domestic and international obligations, but also that the political armature of the state won‚Äôt collapse, seize investment, or otherwise damage the growth of the country.

A current example of this is the Turkish Lira. As disquiet grows over the Erdogan government‚Äôs handling of the country‚Äôs finances, the Turkish Lira has seen a precipitous fall in value as investors lose faith in the future direction of the country and fear economic reprisals.

Market Forces and Their Effect on Exchange Rates

There are, of course, more short-term factors that can spike or depress a currency‚Äôs value. Rumours of upcoming interest rate changes, natural or man-made disasters that inflict economic damage on a country, or simple consumer supply and demand can all affect the value of a currency.

As well as this, of course, are the actions of Forex traders who are speculating on the price of the currency, and by doing so, can instigate market movements. If every Forex trader began collectively shorting the Euro, that impact would be felt on the Euro‚Äôs market value ‚Äî just as with any other market instrument.

This, of course, opens the door to currency manipulation by huge players who by their speculation can hurt the nation‚Äôs economy. A famous example is George Soros, who took short positions on the British pound to the tune of ¬£10 billion. He also egged other investment banks like JP Morgan to get in on the act. The result was catastrophic. The Bank of England desperately tried to buy sterling to negate the effects of the attack, but it wasn‚Äôt enough, and the pound devalued 15%, while George Soros reportedly pocketed $1.1 billion as a result of the speculative assault. Thus, it can be seen that liquidity on exchanges can dramatically impact the market value of a currency for a period of time, until buy or sell pressure subsides.

Onomy Protocol‚Äôs Vision for On-Chain Forex

Foreign exchange rates vary constantly. It represents the constant push and pull of geopolitical market factors allied with the actions of traders who seek to arbitrage and profit from the shifting value in currencies, and the faith, market climate, or expectations in their issuing country. The Forex market is a key machine that helps define the state of international cooperation and competition, and is the largest single market by value throughput, with $6.6 trillion changing hands daily. Similar principles to determining the exchange rates are applicable in the case of stablecoins.

In the case of Onomy Protocol, a financial ecosystem designed to converge centralised finance with its decentralised counterpart by facilitating on-chain Forex trading through the minting of fiat-pegged stablecoins, exchange rates are determined by relying on the NOM token as collateral for all stablecoins minted through the protocol. In other words, just like any other digital asset, NOM has a corresponding fiat value determined in USD, EUR, JPY, CHF, CAD, and others. By over-collateralizing each stablecoin minted and with the help of peg mechanisms operating in the background, the value of each stablecoin will remain stable relative to its real world counterpart, marking a return to the gold-standard model of collateral.

Price divergence that Forex traders bank on follows the standard exchange rates present in the traditional market, whereas slight discrepancies caused by the purchase and sale of currencies in pairs lead to profit or loss for traders, or arbitrage opportunities for advanced traders. This is made possible through our AMM liquidity pools coupled with the order book UI, allowing for simple pricing of Forex trading pairs without relying on oracles.

Powered by a layer-1 Cosmos chain that brings unprecedented efficiency, and later on, via our custom consensus engine, traders worldwide will engage in high frequency Forex trading directly on-chain.

title: Make a Bold Statement About Yourself With a No Pull Pulling Piercing Disc
text:
Make a Bold Statement About Yourself With a No Pull Pulling Piercing Disc Userpierced Dec 15, 2021¬∑2 min read

Body Jewellery is a popular fashion accessory. It may have a religious or cultural meaning for some people, but in the United States, you can wear it to enhance your appearance or even boost your self-esteem. Some people wear it for fashion reasons, while others choose to adorn it for religious or spiritual reasons. No matter which reason you choose, body jewellery is an easy way to make a bold statement about yourself. Whether you want to express your personal style or are simply trying to make a statement about your body type, body jewellery has something for you.

There are two types of jewellery used in body piercing. Surface bars and surface anchors are piercing tools that penetrate flat surfaces. Different designs have different applications, so you need to find the one that fits your unique needs. Here are some examples of body piercing jewellery: ‚Äî Stainless steel and titanium are both biocompatible materials. Stainless steel is the preferred choice for fresh piercings. 316LVM is acceptable steel for body piercing, but it is not necessary.

Choices for Body Piercings

Stainless steel

Stainless steel is an excellent choice for body piercings. 316LVM is certified biocompatible, but not all 316l(VM) stainless steel will meet the same standards for fresh piercings. Also, titanium is anodized to produce a wide variety of colors. The thickness of the oxide layer determines the color. This does not affect the safety of the jewellery.

Titanium

This material is also a good choice for body jewellery. It is a very flexible and breathable metal. The surface bar pierces flat surfaces while the surface anchor penetrates soft surfaces. The surface bar has various designs, and different applications make it suitable for body piercing. Lastly, titanium is biocompatible, as it is a low carbon steel. This metal is durable, and it is not easily dented.

Stainless steel Stainless steel is the most popular material for body jewellery. It is biocompatible, and will not cause any allergic reaction. Its smooth finish is important because it helps prevent bacteria from entering the wound and irritate the skin. If the surface is rough, it will scratch the area and could potentially cause irritation. It is not advisable to buy cheap body jewellery, as it will only increase the risk of a painful infection.

Metal

The metals used for body jewellery are mostly made of low-carbon stainless steel. It has been found that this material is biocompatible, and is a good option for piercings. While some materials are suitable for piercing, others are best avoided. It is important to know which material is safe for your body. Stainless steel is usually considered a safe option for body jewellery, but not all metals are.

title: A community of artisans dedicated to crafting jewelry with values
text:
Meet Sangya Gyawali, Founder of Blooh

A community of artisans dedicated to crafting jewelry with values

Sangya is a systems thinker with experiences in tech and global development. She founded Blooh with the aim to provide market access and digital tools for creatives and small manufacturers. She‚Äôs a Schwarzman Scholar and an Alter Fellow. Products by Women Follow Dec 31, 2021 ¬∑ 4 min read

Blooh is a community of artisans dedicated to good design. Each jewelry piece encapsulates long perfected skills, hope, and cultural symbols that have persisted through time. How products are made matters. Currently, we are working exclusively with skilled artisans and groups supporting them in Kenya. Every item in the Blooh marketplace is made by their hands and inspired by timeless craftsmanship. Each product catalyzes freedom and entrepreneurship to the highest degree.Use 3EQREWPX7 for 20% off and enter FREE giveaway.

VC, Angel, or Bootstrap ‚Äî and why?

Blooh has been bootstrapped so far. It was the quickest way to get started and validate our products with our customers. But we‚Äôll be seeking out capital very soon to grow.

What is your vision and mission and what inspired you to start working on Blooh?

Blooh exists to democratize access to markets for independent and small creators. I was inspired a lot by the people I met while I worked in Uganda and Kenya the past few years. They had amazing talent but couldn‚Äôt reach customers consistently on their own.

How has your experience in Product and tech helped you bring Blooh to life?

While the handmade and creative sector has great potential, it‚Äôs also fragmented into regions, skill level etc. We use tech and automation to standardize a lot of our on the ground operations so we can provide speed and accuracy in all our processes. I‚Äôm very excited about this part of our work because the potential of what can be enabled with tech is limitless.

How would you describe Blooh‚Äôs aesthetic?

Vibrant, Simple Chic

Tell us about the sourcing and how you keep the prices accessible.

We collaborate directly with small manufacturers and global artisans to make our jewelry. Currently we‚Äôre working with various communities in Kenya to do this along with emerging designers in the US. It‚Äôs a partnership through and through. We want to create space for new and fresh ideas while enabling new streams of fair income and work for those who regularly have little access.

Were there any big surprises or challenges you encountered along the way?

We launched during the pandemic which proved to be quite challenging given most people were indoors. Knowing your customers early on was key so we just got creative with it. Also bootstrapping allowed us to go fast but I‚Äôm looking forward to growing in the next year.

Amani Hoop Set

Any favorite pieces you‚Äôve been wearing lately?

At home I almost always wear a small hoop from the Amani Hoop Set. If I‚Äôm leaving the house, I‚Äôll add on the bottom hoop ‚Äî it‚Äôs so easy.

Any exciting initiatives in the pipeline?

Yes! We have a bunch of partnerships in the works. We‚Äôll bring on our non-profit partner soon to double down on our impact. I‚Äôm looking forward to sharing more.

What‚Äôs the biggest risk your business ever took?

When I started, it was without a business plan. As a newcomer to the sector, I just wanted to learn fast without getting too caught up on the planning. It‚Äôs truly been a year of discovery. The last few months have been much more about strategizing.

Which one thing do you wish you‚Äôd done differently?

I would‚Äôve paid a bit more attention to partnerships and raising earlier on. I spent a lot of the early days understanding our product and customers which will help bring on the next phase of our growth.

title: Flexible Tongue Nipple Piercing
text:
Having a flexible barbell tongue nipple piercing is a great way to have an earring on your tongue. These bars move with your tongue, making them a great choice for sensitive areas. They are also perfect for hospital visits and places where metallic items are not allowed. They come in bright colors and some glow in the dark when exposed to UV light. Plus, they are very affordable and easy to care for.

If you‚Äôd like to have a barbell nipple piercing but are concerned about the look of the jewellery, consider getting a captive ring. The pendants are easy to put on and take off and look very elegant. They also come in different sizes and colors, so you can find one that fits your personality. In addition to a gem clustered end, you can also choose to get a titanium barbell with a gem set in it. This is a good choice for a more classic look and is also a great way to add some pizazz to your nipple piercing.

Proper Aftercare

After you‚Äôve had your nipple pierced, you need to be sure to keep up with proper aftercare. You should clean your nipples with water or alcohol 2‚Äì3 times a day. This will help loosen the crusts that form over time. This is a normal process and will make your jewellery look better. You should avoid turning your nipples while cleaning your nipple, as this can cause it to migrate or reject.

Your gauge should be 14g or 12g, and you can always stretch it later if needed. Choosing a gauge smaller than 14g may result in a ‚Äúcheese cutter‚Äù effect, in which the jewellery slowly migrates out. For this reason, you should opt for a larger gauge. Lastly, you should know that every body‚Äôs anatomy is different, so you need to experiment with a variety of sizes for your nipple.

Once you have your nipple piercing, you should continue to follow up with aftercare. First, spritz your nipples with water two to three times daily to help loosen the crusts that form. Crusties are a natural part of the healing process and are whitish. You should not turn the jewellery to break up the crusts. However, you should be aware of the size of your nipples.

After the nipple piercing, it is important to follow upcare. Depending on the size of your nipple, you should spritz the nipples with water at least twice a day. The spritz will help loosen any crusts that form. These crusts are a normal part of the healing process and should not be twisted. Instead, spritz the nipples at least once a day.

title: Triditive wins GoHub‚Äôs Global Water Challenge in Barcelona with its ultra-fast software to digitally transform the industry of the future
text:
Triditive wins GoHub‚Äôs Global Water Challenge in Barcelona with its ultra-fast software to digitally transform the industry of the future

The winner of The Global Water Challenge Barcelona, the GoHub initiative that connects the best startups with global technology needs for the sustainable digital transformation of industry, is a cloud-based manufacturing platform that streamlines production and component sourcing processes at the click of a button GoHub Nov 25, 2021¬∑4 min read

The startup Triditive, whose ultra-fast cloud-based software digitally transforms manufacturing processes and solves component sourcing problems for industry while reducing costs, has won The Global Water Challenge (TGWC) held in Barcelona.

This international initiative was launched by GoHub, the corporate venturing arm of Global Omnium, together with IBM and was backed by Tech Barcelona and Acci√≥, the Regional Government of Catalonia‚Äôs Business Competitiveness Agency. It aims to connect the best startups with global technology needs to drive the digital transformation of industry and make it smarter, more resilient and more sustainable.

The winner of The Global Water Challenge Barcelona was announced this Tuesday during the final gala held in pitch format at Tech Spirit Barcelona, the flagship event of the technological and entrepreneurial ecosystem. The other shortlisted startups taking part in the event were Sigma Industrial Precision, HYDS, Fregata Space and Prenomics.

A system that delivers a genuine paradigm shift

Triditive has developed powerful cloud-based automation software that speeds up additive manufacturing and component sourcing for industry, and also reduces production costs. Its solution enables the supply of critical components in 24 hours through a system that digitally automates inventories, analyses their costs and manufacturing times, and produces parts from a single platform, ensuring just-in-time service for any type of industry.

Triditive pitching during the final event of The Global Water Challenge at Tech Spirit Barcelona.

It helps industries to operate independently of external markets and addresses urgent issues such as supply shortages, logistics bottlenecks and rising costs.

Triditive solves many of the challenges posed by TGWC, such as the digital transformation of systems and inventories, cost reduction and process automation, lower impact of transoceanic logistics shipments and increased efficiency, thus significantly shortening part manufacturing and shipping times.

Triditive was co-founded by Jos√© Camero, Sergio Mart√≠nez and Mariel D√≠az, the firm‚Äôs CEO, who was included in the High Commissioner for Spain Entrepreneurial Nation‚Äôs Women in Innovative Entrepreneurship Guide. D√≠az was also a member of the panel that presented the document at Moncloa Palace, the Prime Minister of Spain‚Äôs official residence.

The startup was chosen by a panel of judges made up of Isabel Gim√©nez, Manager of GoHub Barcelona; Enric Delgado, IBM‚Äôs Chief Technology Officer for Spain, Portugal, Greece and Israel; Miquel Mart√≠, CEO of Tech Barcelona, and Jordi Aguasca, Director of Technology Transformation and Disruption at Acci√≥.

Enric Delgado (IBM), Jordi Aguasca (Acci√≥), Mariel D√≠az and Jos√© Camero (Triditive), Isabel Gim√©nez (GoHub) and Mar Galt√©s (Barcelona Tech City).

As the winner of The Global Water Challenge, Triditive, which was Techstars‚Äô first investment in Spain, is set to receive up to ‚Ç¨3 million from GoHub. It will also be given the chance to develop a paid use case at Global Omnium, one of the world‚Äôs top five water utilities, and will become part of its portfolio of startups.

It will also have access to the network of experts and mentors in GoHub and IBM which, in turn, will provide support for the use of its technology. It will also benefit from business mentoring sessions at the IBM Garage in Madrid together with 120,000 credits in annual interest-free funding. In addition, it will become a member of Tech Barcelona, gaining preferential access to activities, content and events.

Keys to The Global Water Challenge

The Global Water Challenge is one of GoHub‚Äôs flagship projects. It is based on the premise that industry processes must be optimised if resources are to be managed sustainably and more efficiently. Technology and digital transformation are pivotal to this goal.

To this end, GoHub launched a call for startups in the world‚Äôs most important ecosystems, in conjunction with strategic local partners. The roadmap started in New York and, after Barcelona, has been replicated in the Scandinavian ecosystem with Helsinki as its epicentre. By 2022, it is expected to reach Canada and Amsterdam. For more information: https://theglobalwaterchallenge.tech/

GoHub by Global Omnium

GoHub, launched in 2019, is Global Omnium‚Äôs corporate venturing arm for investing in startups which bring disruptive solutions to process automation, cost reduction, product innovation and sustainability in Industry 4.0.

The Global Omnium Group

Chaired by Eugenio Calabuig, Global Omnium was founded in Valencia 130 years ago, and operates today in over 400 cities in Spain, where it manages the entire water cycle in conjunction with local governments. Its international expansion through Idrica, the utility‚Äôs technological solutions platform, now encompasses four continents with over seven million customers. Global Omnium is a benchmark in the sector and is among the top five water utilities in the world.

title: Want Decor Items For Your First House?
text:
You can browse through any shop that sells furniture and accessories in inspired by shabby chic to see a wide selection of gorgeous objects. If you‚Äôre looking to have your home appear more appealing by incorporating an appealing design, the most important elements to incorporate into your home are:

Personal statement using color

There‚Äôs nothing that shows your personality more than the shade you wear. It‚Äôs your decision to play around with various shades and shades. If you‚Äôre unsure, choose either blue or a cream shade that blend with one another and offer a wonderful contrast to the various shades.

Wall adornments

The most simple method for hanging it is hanging wall art or wall d√©cor. You can buy beautiful rustic wall decor that is rustic and shabby chic, and then place them in your living space in the beginning. You can also opt to create DIY art that showcases your imagination more than ever before.

Curtains

While they can offer some protection Curtains must reflect your personal taste. Curtains made of plastic or paper are not appropriate anymore. Select curtains made of fabrics with the right hue to match the decor that you have on your wall.

Storage

If you‚Äôve got duffel bags that could be used for your dorm now is the time to create space to store the things you‚Äôve discovered. It will take some imagination because the space available is likely to be smaller than the things that you already have. Colors are a great option for this scenario.

Floor art

Choose a rug for your floor to protect your floor. It is not necessary to buy Isfahan Persian to show off your exquisite taste. In fact , a hand-woven DIY rug could be equally good. Being able to weave patterns patterns, and textures make the room appear more lively.

Statement item

It is crucial to own an item which is distinct from what you already have. This could include a memento from home or school or a gift from a friend or loved one. Antique items are great to make this. DIY objects are attractive because they‚Äôre unique in their design. A beautiful chandelier could be stunning.

Lighting

The stunning lighting and shades with gorgeous shades makes rooms very cozy. Every room should have lighting that complements the room. Lighting that is colored is ideal for bedrooms and bathrooms as white lights are ideal for tables for reading.

If you‚Äôre planning to build your first home, make sure that you choose basic designs that can be easily adjusted to smaller areas, and to the style that will make you happy.

title: 10 Paint Colors That Makes Any Small Space Feel Way Bigger
text:
10 BEST PAINT COLORS FOR SMALL ROOMS

It‚Äôs all about the paint, friends. The right color on your walls can make even the humblest of living quarters feel like a palace. So today we are sharing the 10 best small-space paint colors to make your room feel way bigger than it actually is.

When it comes to making a small space feel bigger, paint is an incredible tool. It can be used to highlight or accentuate certain areas to make them feel larger, while other colors and patterns can help to draw the eye away from areas that feel cramped. No matter how big your home is, there‚Äôs one thing we can all relate to trying to make a small space feel bigger.

Here are the ten paint colors we think will work best to help you create a space that feels larger than it is. Some of these might be the right color choice for your room, and some might be the opposite. So take this information as a starting point and have fun exploring the options.

1. WHITE

The best way to make your space feel larger is to use white. It will instantly lighten up a room and make it feel bigger. White also works surprisingly well with many other colors, so you can still find ways to make your space feel bigger without sacrificing your style. Just pair a crisp white paint color with a bold rug or statement pillows to instantly make your space feel bigger, without the need to over-exploit your square footage.

When most people think of white walls, they think of a space that is bright and airy. But crisp white isn‚Äôt just for large rooms; it can actually be a great choice for smaller ones too. In fact, simple white paint color can breathe new life into even the smallest space, making it feel much larger than it actually is.

2. PURPLE

When it comes to making a small space look and feel bigger, nothing beats the power of purple. The bold color has a tendency to make rooms look and feel bigger than they actually are. It‚Äôs no wonder, then, that so many homeowners have turned to the color in recent years in an attempt to make their homes feel more spacious.

It‚Äôs no secret that purple is one of the most powerful colors in the world. It has the ability to invoke feelings of royalty, luxury, and extravagance. When used in the right way, purple can have a similar impact on the size of a room. By utilizing this color in a small space, you can give the illusion of a much larger area.

3. PEARL GRAY

If you want to make a room look bigger than it actually is, there‚Äôs one paint color that will do the job better than any other: pearl gray.

This understated hue is the most neutral background color you can choose, which is why it‚Äôs the best backdrop for decorating. It will let you make the most of your small-space style with colorful accent pieces without overwhelming your space. It‚Äôs an especially great choice for small rooms because it helps them feel bigger than they are.

4. SAGE GREEN

Sage color is a great option to try if you‚Äôre looking to make your home space feel bigger without committing to a bold, dramatic color. From fresh white to rich brown, sage color is a great way to add a burst of warmth to a room with just a few easy tips.

Sage is one of those under-appreciated, but seriously powerful, color palettes.

It‚Äôs so versatile that it can work in any space, from small and modern to country chic.

5. PASTEL YELLOW

Are some subtle and sophisticated ways to make your small space feel larger, like when you use pastel yellow paint to highlight a feature wall.

This color is a great way to add brightness, especially to a room that is usually dull or dark, and it doesn‚Äôt require much space or money to achieve a big impact. In this case, a small accent wall painted in a pastel yellow will make your bedroom look larger than it is.

You can also use this trick in the living room to add some life to the space and separate the room into different areas.

6. GREIGE

When we think about the quintessential paint color for a home, greige probably doesn‚Äôt immediately come to mind. After all, the color is similar to a medium beige, which is often associated with neutral and clean spaces.

But, greige paint color is so much more than just a simple beige. Instead, this warm, medium grey color has a tone that‚Äôs similar to taupe, making it a great choice for almost any room in your house.

7. NAVY

The navy paint color can make your room feel bigger than it really is. It creates a sense of space, and it also gives your room more dimension. Additionally, the perfect combination of navy and white creates a sense of sophistication and elegance. The navy paint color is a classic, because it is both dark and light, creating a sharp contrast between the wall and the ceiling.

Because navy is a dark color, you can use it to cover up the dark walls of a smaller space. Mink brown is a color that you can paint the walls of your living room or bathroom to create a cozy, dark space. This neutral color will help to make your small space feel big.

8. MINT GREEN

When it comes to making your space feel larger, one of the most effective tricks is to use bold color. It‚Äôs no secret that certain colors have been shown to make rooms feel larger than others, with green being one of them.

For example, a large area painted mint green in a living room was shown to make that room feel 50% larger than it actually was, according to a study by the University of Michigan.

Few colors are as universally calming and refreshing as mint. While most people think of mint as a wall color, it has also been used for ceilings, TVs, and even furniture.

9. KHAKI

If you want a room with a neutral, or almost neutral tone with a modern, clean, and fresh feel, the best color to get you in the right mindset is khaki. It‚Äôs a very classic color and it looks great in any room.

From a design perspective, khaki is a great color to use as a base for a room because it‚Äôs such a neutral.

It works well with most decors and can easily be matched with other colors to give your space a cohesive look and feel. It also works well with a variety of styles, from traditional to modern, which means you can easily transition your space from one style to another if you ever decide to change up your decor. But of course, the best thing about khaki is that it works well with almost any other color.

10. DARK GREEN

When it comes to small spaces, dark green is your best friend. The color is great for making any space feel open and airy, and its neutral hue works in any and every space.

From bedrooms to dining rooms to kitchens, dark green paint will have you feeling like you have a lot more space than you do. And if you want to take the roominess even further, you can always add in some white accents to the walls and ceiling for a little extra lightness and brightness.

In this article, we have provided you with a list of ten paint colors that will make any small room look bigger. We hope these tips have been helpful!
