title: The Savior in ‚ÄúSpider-Man: Homecoming‚Äù
text:
The Demiurge extends outwardly in another way, as a general spiritual ‚Äòzeitgeist‚Äô that blows between each of us and all around.

A significant expression is found in our highest moral and judicial authorities; as ‚ÄúMatriarchy‚Äù and as ‚ÄúPatriarchy‚Äù.

The pressures from these two ‚Äògods‚Äô touch us every day, and manifest in many different ways; between personal relationships, among faculty and staff, written into policy, code, and law; and as latent, reactionary ‚Äúchemicals‚Äù in our individual and collective subconscious.

In spirit, both are aspects of the same Demiurge, and both are conveyed by the apparatus of the state. The gendering of the literal expression is mixed, but is principally male. This is the state as in government, and as a state of mind ‚Äî and states always change, slowly or suddenly.

Our present situation is a transition between a masculine conscious dominant and one that‚Äôs feminine, as is reflected in astrology‚Äôs metaphor of the movement from Pices (fish) into the age of Aquarius (water). These transitions are historically accompanied by large outputs of novel mythology synthesized out of the symbolic language of previous generations. Not perfectly overlapping, but rhyming. (I don‚Äôt have an opinion on the ‚Äòrealness‚Äô of astrology, nor many of the other concepts in this post. I‚Äôm just interested in searching for the presence of pattern.)

Each Age is a day, and the transition between them is the darkness.

Matriarchy and Patriarchy each comes with their own light and shadow; Benign spirits and their aggressive shades, working together in dance or in conflict to produce distorted beauty and flawed order.

The human act of creation and need for control; the shifting rules of law and and those of morality ‚Äî both are right and wrong, and both are often correct in their criticisms of the other. Each recognizes the other‚Äôs shadow, but remains ignorant of its own.

This paradoxical division reflects the devious ‚Äòtwoness‚Äô of Two, and serves here as one example of many drives conducting our behavior. The flaws of law and morality can be seen as the flaw, or ‚Äòsin‚Äô of flesh ‚Äî symbols and archetypes born into our reality through the imperfections of body and mind.

Spider-Man swings from the third and attempts to unite the two with the bonds of his web.

title: The Class System Of NFTMan: An Overview
text:
Eight classes of Heroes with absolutely different appearances.

There are eight unique classes of heroes living in the imaginative world of NFTMan and each of them has different abilities and features.

Correspondingly, there are eight types of equipment. They are swords, boxing gloves, bow and arrow, shield, twin blades, ax, hammer, mage staff, and so on. Weapons also vary in appearance.

NFTMan breaks the traditional concept of game classes. For example, Knights no longer need to wear heavy armor; Mages no longer need to wear robes. Through our genetic system, you can customize the appearance of your NFT heroes. Although the appearance of heroes is imaginative and various, you can always identify their classes by their equipment.

Equipped with boxing gloves, fighter is both offensive and defensive, capable of playing any position in the team.

Moreover, a hero‚Äôs class will take effect on his skills. For example, heroes who use one-handed swords, ultimate skills, and basic skills are all related to one-handed swords.

Our presale is coming soon. You don‚Äôt want to miss NFTMan. Follow us to get the latest news about NFTMan.

Twitter: @NFTMan

Discord: https://discord.gg/gSEX75dgMb

Telegram: https://t.me/nftmanglobal

Our official website: www.nftman.io

title: Some words on the Divine Fund
text:
Divine Inu,

We sincerely hope that all of you had a good break over Christmas.

The core team had a couple of days off, and are now back in the game again.

The Divine Fund is a development, investment and reward-generating fund managed by the core team. Inside it contains an index of tokens and NFT‚Äôs from various blockchain and cryptocurrency projects. Any tokens or coins captured as a result of our project or it‚Äôs tokenomics are deposited into this fund and provide another layer of value for the investors and the project.

As long as blockchains remain in operation, one thing will not change: Seed and private sale investors enjoy the most benefits. By using our contacts and expertise in the crypto space, we can leverage this fact to our advantage.

To further compliment this, we‚Äôll also be adding a stable of blue chip cryptocurrencies and finishing up with altcoins.

If the Divine Fund is managed efficiently and its assets outperform the market, the value locked within it could exceed the value of our native token, which will reduce our investors‚Äô portfolio risk exposure as a result.

Utilizing investment and yield farming profits from the Divine Fund, the native tokens will be bought back at certain intervals and stored, increasing value and scarcity of our native token while also increasing reflections rewards towards the project.

Unlike the fund, which aims to maximize yield for its investors, the Reserve aims to support our community growth initiatives and other activities solely aimed at growing our user base.

Projects may apply for funding from the Divine Fund.

If we believe that the potential outweighs the risk after proper risk management procedures have been carried out, we will then invest in the project and in return, receive their native token and stash those in our fund.

By staking the Divine Inu token‚Äî the investor is given the right to dividend payouts from the fund as well as getting NFT‚Äôs unlocked and eventually sent to his or her wallet.

All the best,

title: Flight of the Navigator Update v16
text:
Here‚Äôs what to expect this new year. I‚Äôve debated between breaking this down by quarters, or by topic. I‚Äôve opted for the latter as we‚Äôre still nailing down our roadmaps for each of the projects, however I‚Äôll attempt to be as specific as I can with the information I currently have available. Over the next few weeks we‚Äôll be publishing more documents digging into the projects in more details with a more detailed roadmap. I‚Äôll also attempt to answer any questions I‚Äôve seen from the community so far.

$NICE $CRUSH you got there-

First let‚Äôs talk about the elephant in the room. Dumpers. God I hate dumpers. For the most part it seems like most sells are coming from other projects, and I think that makes sense as they may not really understand the Bitcrush as a whole.

The bad news is there‚Äôs not much we can do about dumpers, aside from continuing to try and educate users, as well as bring in more buyers. That being said, we are very close to being deflationary. At this point 88% of $CRUSH rewards have been distributed, and only about 1.2M remain. That may sound like a lot, but in about 4‚Äì6 weeks we‚Äôre done.

So what happens then?

$CRUSH becomes almost entirely deflationary. What I mean by that is while we still have 10M allocated for P2E, the rate of emission for those $CRUSH will be slower than the burn rate of $CRUSH. The numbers aren‚Äôt final yet, but I believe that P2E will start at 1 $CRUSH earned for every 1000 wagered. When you take into account a 1% house edge, that means for every 1000 wagered, 10 $CRUSH average is profit, and 1% of that (.1) Crush is burned. However, we also need to take into account additional burn mechanisms from other Live Wallet tokens, Black Hodle referrals, Crush n Burn lottery, and the auto-compound burns. Essentially, in approximately 4‚Äì6 weeks, the only way to get $CRUSH will be to play games, purchase it, or be staked in our Staking Pool 2.0.

Which brings up the point, if there‚Äôs no more $CRUSH for rewards, what will that look like. This is where $NICE comes in. For those unaware, a second token was always the plan, and is even in the whitepaper.

As the core CRUSH coin supply decreases and price increases, the CRUSH coin will become a share token, and additional Crush Chips will be introduced with varying supply to address medium and lower wagering markets. The emphasis will always be on the staked CRUSH Coins to mine APY and receive the house profits. The highest pool multipliers will always be for crush coin pools and LPs.

It wasn‚Äôt possible back then to know what it would look like exactly as it rolled out, but now that we‚Äôre here we have a much better idea. While we are still locking down the tokenomics of $NICE, here‚Äôs what we know.

$CRUSH will be transitioning to a share token. Meaning, profits from all products, protocols, and everything we do will go to $CRUSH stakers. Staking $CRUSH is your ticket to profiting from the entire ecosystem.

What does this mean? Game profits will continue to be shared with stakers. N.I.C.E. Invader profits will be shared with stakers. All upcoming marketplace profits will be shared with stakers, and so on.

Additionally, the new games all introduce massive use cases for $CRUSH. N.I.C.E. Invaders requires planets to stake $CRUSH to earn $NICE. They will need to level up and as they do, which requires more $CRUSH. Attacking other planets requires $CRUSH be put up as sort of a wager and can be lost. We‚Äôre still deciding if that lost $CRUSH should be burned, or become profit for stakers. In game there will be Black Hodles that syphon resources and will potentially burn or distribute $CRUSH. We will share more about these when we begin launching the gitbook.

This is just the game, we still have the open world we‚Äôre working on and more. The point here is that $CRUSH inflation is coming to an end, and we‚Äôre just getting started with increased use cases. Below I‚Äôll discuss where we are in development of these.

$NICE will be our inflationary rewards token, and will be taking the place of APY rewards. This means that we will soon be launching our own pools, farms, and even swap (albeit I don‚Äôt yet see the need to become a DEX). We‚Äôre currently discussing whether the fees from these will be used to buy back $CRUSH and burn, or buy back $CRUSH and distribute to stakers. Either way it will have a positive price impact on $CRUSH.

In addition, $NICE will be the mined in game currency that will be used to upgrade game assets, and more. Any items bought/sold on the marketplace will create profit to be shared with $CRUSH stakers.

Long story short, $CRUSH is becoming the share token to reap the rewards from all daily activities transacted by $NICE, as well as getting a big boost in use case.

Bitcrush Arcade Core-

This rollout has been super frustrating to say the least, however we‚Äôre getting there. Just as a bug gets fixed, another pops it. Any techies out there know it‚Äôs always harder to fix someone else‚Äôs mistakes than to just build something yourself. The issues that need to be fixed are the hybrid API and Dice Invaders roll function. Now that the Api is pretty much working properly, we‚Äôre moving along to update our servers so we can rollout the rest of the items on the list.

Here‚Äôs what to expect in chronological order.

Crush n‚ÄôBurn Lottery ‚Äî First week of January. We‚Äôre that close.

BUSD Live Wallet ‚Äî Should be finished 2nd-3rd week of January, and then submitted for audit. Will go live as soon as audit is finished.

Dice Invaders ‚Äî DI just needs to adjust how it retrieves rolls to increase its speed. This isn‚Äôt necessarily difficult, it just hasn‚Äôt been priority as the other items are more critical. However I believe we will be seeing this mid January. Since this doesn‚Äôt require audits there‚Äôs a chance it could drop before the live wallet update, but unsure.

Pools/Farms/Swap ‚Äî These will be coming soon actually. Likely in Feb as soon as $NICE is rolled out.

Referrals and Wager mining ‚Äî Neither of these are difficult, but neither are they priority. However, we should be seeing progress on these late Jan into Feb.

Bitcrush Arcade As A Service ‚Äî We‚Äôre taking our time with this one after what happened with Treasure Key. A version of this is still being planned, we‚Äôre just being cautious. Once the above products are rolled out we‚Äôll have a much better idea. Our lottery may in fact be the first BCAAAS product we roll out. We could maybe see that as soon as Feb.

Additional Games ‚Äî Look for these to begin development likely in March I believe. If things go well we may try and push them sooner.

Nice Invaders Crush Everything-

This is interesting, as while it‚Äôs new for many of you, it‚Äôs always been the plan. For the sake of keeping this from getting too long, we‚Äôll roll the Invaderverse into this section as well.

In fact here‚Äôs a quick screen grab from our earliest WP back in 2019, when we were referring to the game as crypto castles. This was pre-DeFi, and the best chain for casinos back then was Tron üòë.

Clearly the un-edited version was all I could locate.

Thank god the space has developed since then, but the point remains that casino was always only going to be a first use case. While the space and the concept has dramatically evolved, Bitcrush at its core has remained consistent. In fact there was discussion post IDO whether we should focus on the game first and come back to casino later, or proceed as planned. In the end I‚Äôm glad we stuck to our roadmap, as the hybrid model will allow us to do so much more cross-chain with our game. Not to mention, we now have a working casino that will continue to profit as we grow, and will continue to expand it‚Äôs use case cross-chain and in game.

Much of the development has already begun for N.I.C.E. Invaders. We will be adding the gitbook in the next few weeks, but here‚Äôs a sneak peek at what‚Äôs been started in no particular order.

Construction and Upgrading of In Game Assets (not yet tokenized, early implementation)- Assets are used in the mining, building, upgrading, defense, and attack systems. Will be releasing more on these when gitbook releases. As players level up their assets, their mining rate increases.

Faction/Guild Systems (Initial systems in place)- Each planet will require all Invader types to mine, attack, and stay protected. Guilds can be formed to ward off other attackers, or to fight off Black Hodles. Tax rate, protection rate, and voting systems implemented.

Map Framework (early stages)- The map will start off consisting of 100 hundred planets, each of which will require an Emperor and staked $CRUSH to mine $NICE. While there are workarounds with player tribes combining their core leaders to act in place of an Emperor should the planet be unoccupied, the Emperor will always take precedence. Hint: Keep an eye out for Emperor NFTs as they are the rulers of the game.

Black Hodle Logic (early implementation)‚Äî Self spawning Black Hodles (Black Holes) spawn to consume resources and require teaming up to defeat.

Additional work done on the combat systems, world building, leveling/tiers and more.

Early Concept Art

We‚Äôre still in early stages, but a lot work has been done. Here‚Äôs the roadmap and what to expect. Please understand we‚Äôre still in discussion and locking down details, so this is all subject to change in the upcoming weeks, but here‚Äôs what we anticipate.

January- We will be starting to prepare and potentially launching the first round of out Initial NFT Offering. We will be potentially announcing a partner this next week if we come to an agreement. We‚Äôve designed an NFT collection called ‚ÄúMad N.I.C.E. Invaders‚Äù that is meant to exist on markets outside of the game. However players are incentivized to hodl by keeping the NFT and minted game character in the same wallet. We‚Äôre rewarding these ‚ÄúCrushed NFTs‚Äù as we‚Äôre calling them, with rewards from marketplace profits paid out in $CRUSH. The idea behind this uses our hybrid approach to allow the NFT holders to mint their in game character using their collection piece. This will allow the player to burn their game character and mint him again cross-chain (although he would lose any leveling). This could be useful in deciding to sell your NFT on the markets as it is the key to a character, so a rare NFT would allow access to a highly valuable in character. More info will be released on this as we roll out, and functionality is of course subject to change. All this is to say, the first round of the sale will be solely our most rare NFTs; the Emperor, which is needed for planets to mine $NICE. 100 planets, and 100 Emperors only.

We‚Äôre unsure at this point how many will be available for sale, but the priority for the sale will be -

Crush God NFT Holders Staking Pool 2.0 Stakers Public

The second round will include our next 3 most rare invaders, followed by the on going sale of the additional invader roles. We anticipate round one in January, and the other rounds in Feb and ongoing.

Additionally we are discussing a cross-chain IDO for $NICE starting with BSC and Fantom, being launched by a partner who will remain unnamed until it is official. N.I.C.E. Invaders is meant to be cross chain, which means we will need liquidity for both $NICE and $CRUSH on other chains. Additional funds will be used for marketing and increased development.

This will likely start late Jan into Feb. Priority will likely be the same as above.

In Feb/March we anticipate being able to mint your game characters, with the early market place opening up late Q1 and early gameplay in the beginning of Q2. We‚Äôll also be looking for real estate offering and initial Invadervaerse rollout to start around this time as well.

Early Concept Art

In addition some other things to note.

First, expanding our game offerings outside of casino and into the MMO world allows us to expand marketing into more traditional channels, which should translate into increased exposure.

Second, our new team of game developers are much more experienced than the unfortunate team who dropped the ball with Dice Invaders. They have a lot of experience, as well as many delivered products to big name clients, and have been already moving forward solving the issues left behind by the other team. The reason our API works now is thanks to them. They‚Äôre also the ones fixing Dice Invaders and more. Because they are a much more well rounded team, starting in January we will be allowing users to join the development discord server to follow progress, get sneak peeks at art, help provide input, and more. Essentially the development process will become much more transparent, interactive, and effective.

I know this has been a long read, but there is so much to cover and so much going on right now.

We‚Äôre so excited for our new and existing path. A ton of work ahead but a lot of movement and excitement on the way.

Let‚Äôs leave 2021 in the dumpster where it belongs, and get excited for 2022 so we can all‚Ä¶

title: League of Zodiacs‚Äô Destination

title: It‚Äôs official: FNDZ is now listed on Blockfolio (now FTX)
text:
We are thrilled to announce that FNDZ has been listed on FTX (previously Blockfolio), the cryptocurrency tracking application.

Holders of FNDZ tokens will be able to conveniently track and monitor their tokens, as well as their other assets. We‚Äôve gained traction with our project as a result of our MEXC listing and the product developments we‚Äôve made.

With over five million users, FTX (Blockfolio) is the world‚Äôs most popular bitcoin and cryptocurrency tracker. If you are already an FTX app user, make sure to create a portfolio for your $FNDZ holdings and begin tracking. The app is completely free!

Follow these simple steps to begin:

Download and install the FTX (formerly Blockfolio) app on your iOS/Android device. When the app is launched, navigate to the ‚ÄòTrack‚Äô area and hit the + button at the bottom of the page. In the search field, type ‚ÄòFNDZ‚Äô and then press on $FNDZ. Awesome! Your portfolio is now tracking $FNDZ! By tapping the ADD button, you can now further personalise your holdings. You can also use the Bell button to receive notifications about price changes.

About FNDZ

The FNDZ‚Äôs motto is ‚ÄúDeFi copy trading made simple.‚Äù FNDZ has developed a DeFi copy trading platform that enables copy/social trading from a truly decentralized perspective. DeFi, or decentralized finance, is a financial infrastructure made up of blockchain-powered smart contracts and protocols which collectively carry out the same functions traditionally handled by brokers, bankers, and financiers. FNDZ uses these tools to provide a fully transparent, low-cost, highly efficient, and user-friendly copy trading experience.

FNDZ ‚Äî Social Media

Website | Telegram |Announcements | Twitter | YouTube | Discord | Medium | Reddit | Instagram | Github

title: Mint On Demand Contract
text:
We have created a regular basic cryptocurrency, a coin that is mintable, a crypto faucet and a selfdrop contract. Lets combine a mintable coin with a selfdrop contract and also drop the ownership of the coin and contract.

Can‚Äôt read the full article? Become a member of Medium here

Having control over a coin and/or it‚Äôs contract is really only useful for playing around and testing out new stuff. But if you wish to sell it and want other people to trust it enough to be willing to invest in it, they have to know that you can‚Äôt just make new coins directly to your own wallet whenever you want.

The code can be found at github: https://github.com/Creepybits/BEP-20-contracts/blob/Master/SuperSale.sol

Once you have compiled the code without errors, you need to chose the SaleDeployer contract at the deployment page.

Name your coin, give it a symbol and provide the address where you want the currency from the purchases should be sent. Press transact.

Once you have confirmed the deployment in metamask you get a dropdown menu under ‚ÄúDeployed Contracts‚Äù. Reveal the address of the token as well as the sales contract by pressing on it‚Äôs respecive button.

Chose the Supercoin contract, copy the token_address and put it in the ‚ÄúAt Address‚Äù text field and press the ‚ÄúAt Address‚Äù button. Then chose the SuperSale contract, copy the token_sale_address and put it in the ‚ÄúAt Address‚Äù text field and press the ‚ÄúAt Address‚Äù button.

When you expand the SuperSale contract under deployed contracts, you can see the sales rate, token address, which address the currency from the sales will be sent to and amount of currency raised so far.

If you expand the Supercoin contract you also get various types of information. You can try to mint coins or add a new minter, but you will get error messages. You are no longer the owner of the contract, and only the sales contract is allowed to mint new coins. By putting the address of the sales contract in the ‚ÄúisMinter‚Äù box and press the button, you will get confirmation that the sales contract is the minter.

When you send currency (in this case BNB) to the sales contract, it will mint your coins and send it back to you. The picture below shows how I‚Äôm sending 0.05 BNB to the sales contract, the sales contract forwards the 0.05 BNB to the address we provided as the beneficiary when we first deployed the SaleDeployer contract, and finally 500 Super Coins is minted and sent to the address of the buyer.

If you wish to use another rate for your sales, you can change it almost all the way down at the bottom of the code. You change the ‚Äú10000‚Äù to whichever rate you prefer.

I hope you have enjoyed this guide on how to write a mint on demand contract. Check out my other guides as well if you haven‚Äôt already.
