Download the full guide: Fare Scraping and Excess Transactions: The Real Cost to the Travel Industry

The post How much is fare scraping costing the travel industry? appeared first on Netacea.

title: What is a Veneer?
text:
Veneers are one possible solution to help you achieve the look you want. They are a popular choice for people with broken teeth, tooth gaps, or malformed teeth.

Dental Veneer is a thin cover that adheres to teeth and gives a classic shape look. You can choose from a variety of tooth veneer options. Talk to your dentist about what works best for you.

Dental Veneer

If you want to enhance your smile, a veneer is an easy option. A veneer is a thin cover that is placed on the front (visible) part of the tooth. They look like natural teeth. Veneers can be used to fix a variety of dental problems, including:

1)Teeth that discolor and cannot be brightened by bleaching

2) Missing or worn teeth

3) Bent or deformed teeth

4) Non-uniform space or a large gap between upper anterior teeth Veneer is made of either porcelain or composite material. Your dentist will help you choose the material that is most suitable for you. Each type of veneer has its advantages.

Porcelain Veneer

Porcelain veneers are thin shells that are individually adapted to the teeth.

Advantages of porcelain veneer:

1) Durable and durable

2) It has a natural finish

3) Less enamel needs to be removed than crowns and caps

4) Stain-resistant

Porcelain veneer application procedure:

To prepare the teeth, the dentist usually removes a small amount of enamel from the front and sides of the teeth. This gives the veneer space to make the teeth look natural

The dentist makes the impression and shape of the prepared teeth. The dentist will also determine the best veneer shade for your smile.

Impressions are sent to the dental laboratory, which adapts the porcelain veneer to the individual teeth. This may take several days. In the meantime, the dentist can have you wear a temporary veneer.

On your next visit, the dentist will place the veneer on your teeth to check the fit and shape. After adjustment, clean the teeth and glue the veneer to the teeth.

Further changes are possible at a later date.

Composite Resin veneer

Composite veneers are made up of tooth-colored fillers that are glued to the teeth. Advantages of composite veneers:

Usually, less enamel needs to be removed than crowns and ceramic veneers.

Fewer visits to the dentist-these veneers may only need one visit.

Cheaper than Chinese veneer.

Easy to repair if damaged.

Composite veneers are generally not as strong and wear-resistant as ceramic veneers, but composite veneers are easy and quick to repair.

Steps to place composite resin veneers:

1) After the teeth are prepared or reshaped, the dentist carefully bonds and sculpts the composite material using a color that is best for you.

2) A special light is used to harden the composite and bond it to your teeth.

3) The veneers are smoothed and polished to look like natural teeth.

title: Niftyx Protocol: product pipeline and rollout strategy
text:
Hi Shroomies! As we wrap up this year we‚Äôd like to shed some light on what‚Äôs coming in early 2022 with our rollout plan, and also show additional sneak peeks of work we‚Äôve done internally.

This past year has been one of transitions, introspection, waiting, planning, and finally all pieces are falling into place. We‚Äôve gone from targeting indie games to doubling-down on AAA-quality titles. From being a pixelated meme to adopting a better brand ready for the mainstream. We have learned that quality takes time, and accepted trade-offs that allow us to not compromise or give up our vision of an open, neutral and community-driven Metaverse.

Just some growing pains! And we did everything to ensure that we end up with a future-proof project. So, here‚Äôs what to expect as we enter the new year and in what order‚Ä¶

What to expect ‚Äî Timeline of Events

Current timeline of events as per best effort estimates

Each of the timeline items will come with a dedicated post in the coming days and weeks, so we will simply go over the overall strategy. There are more items but the general action plan for the first months of the year could be summarised in 3 simple stages.

Liquidity Improvements ‚Üí Subnet setup ‚Üí DEX and Game launch

This doesn‚Äôt mean that advances for each of these work streams won‚Äôt happen in parallel. We have a lot of stuff being cooked in the kitchen at the same time!

SHROOM migration and Liquidity Program.

Drawing inspiration from new algorithmic reserve currencies, we will borrow some of their innovations and apply them to our ecosystem, which already has a compelling use case as NFT trading layer.

Having protocol owned liquidity has undeniable benefits and will ultimately help us solve liquidity issues and slowly build a treasury of risk-free + ecosystem assets that can be deployed to further boost the growth of our protocols.

In the next post we will be announcing the migration plan and the new incentives to attract liquidity as well as honouring the pending rewards as soon as the new GSWAP token is issued in our upcoming subnet.

Gaming Subnet setup

Avalanche Subnets should be feature-complete during Q1, and as you know this is a moment that we‚Äôve been waiting for over a year. Cross-subnet transfer will be the final critical feature that will allow teams to build with confidence without fears of their ecosystems being isolated.

During the Gameswap subnet bootstrapping the new GSWAP token will be issued with renewed tokenomics that we will explain in an upcoming update. The main change will be the introduction of a small inflationary process. Of course the community will need to approve any tokenomic changes.

We remain positive our Subnet will be operational at some point during Q1.

Gameswap DEX release

Following the Subnet launch focus will switch to the Gameswap DEX release, first for beta testers and then for the general public. NFT trading and protocol rewards via staking will be available from the get go.

New staking section

We have been adding additional views such as integrated bridge in the UI, Staking/Farming views, and many more that will be functional on launch day.

A superior bridging experience will help Gameswap attract liquidity to/from other chains

AAA Game dropping during first half of the year!

A lot has been talked about ‚Äúthe game‚Äù, and it almost seems like it‚Äôs the only topic, but we can‚Äôt stress how important it will be for the ecosystem so obviously we should all be very excited.

Not only will it be setting the bar for the quality of the assets that we expect to host on Gameswap, it will also introduce the NFT technology standards that future games will need to adopt there.

The game world is primarily set in an ‚ÄòAccretion Class‚Äô asteroid, at geosynchronous orbit in 2126

Gameswap will be betting on new technology and it will be a requirement for listed games to integrate using it. The goal is to progressively build a AAA Metaverse, where true migration of assets from game to game is achieved flawlessly via standard primitives for trading, VFX and SFX.

The development for this game system is designed to be available as a basis for this Metaverse building process, a building block that can help the community build an open system moving forward.

Early Artwork (Q2'2021) of in-game AI (albeit a hacked AI from the Exomarts)

Weapons and characters in the game are expanded by an AI system which adds an extra dimension to the NFT collections, this is along with a number of other features that add a variety of new gameplay experiences are being kept mostly under wraps for now but will be revealed along with the game itself. Achieving composable NFTs across games will unlock new gaming experiences, this is part of a larger system that is built on a standard designed to be beneficial to both players and developers.

There are more than 30 types of weapons and other equipment being built with unparalleled details and most are ready now

The emphasis in this game world is about creating engaging stories with great characters and new, interesting gameplay.. Real quality of immersion is key, blurring the line between the real world and the game world is where the most fun lies.

We have been low-key leaking some details about what‚Äôs being built, and who is building it‚Ä¶ so there are many reasons to be excited about the 1st upcoming trailer and game reveal in January. And obviously for the playable alpha launch during late Q1'2022 with priority access for the Niftyx community! üéâ

Next steps

The next update will cover details about the SHROOM migration after we discuss and nail down some details with the community.

We don‚Äôt want to steal more time from your NYE celebrations. So with this update we want to say thank you for being there supporting us all these past months and we want to give you reasons to believe that 2022 will be a great year for our ecosystem!

Happy Pew Year!!!

Niftyx Team

title: Valorant impact value: giving credit where credit is due
text:
It is indisputable that current Valorant stats are shallow, totally duelist-oriented and do not reflect the true impact of certain actions within the match. Let‚Äôs say you are playing Split defense and you guys just won the pistol round against attackers. On the second round, some of your hungry team mates randomly decides to overextend mid and he ends up taking multiple gunfights at once. Roughly speaking: can it be an impactful play? Let‚Äôs dive into it

Outcome A: he gets 3 kills and falls back into cover

Outcome B: he gets the same 3 kills, but dies and gives his Spectre to his enemies

Outcome C: he does not get a single kill, dies and and gives his Spectre to his enemies

Combinatorily speaking, going for multiple gunfights at once is a task classified as high risk (there is a chance of gifting your spectre to enemies) low reward (regardless of what you do, your team should always be winning that round). That being said, the duty of winning the round is never in the shoulders of the team that lost the pistol. Because of this, each kill the attackers get brings way more value to the table than each kill the defenders get.

That theory sounds cool on paper, but does it really works like that on real matches? Let‚Äôs look at one example and see if things goes as we expected :)

Round example here

Defense win probability at round 2

Impact table on round 2

As we can see in the table, defender kills (and multi-kills) increases little to nothing the chances of defenders winning an already favourable round, while any kill the attacker team gets flips the odds by a huge margin.

Although both MkaeL and dapr got 3 kills, just one of them was supposed to win that round, the other was not. This leads to a 109.99 delta impact for MkaeL and only -0.34 for dapr. Cool, no?

Let‚Äôs take a look at how ACS treated the same situation

As you probably already expected, ACS treated both situations as if they were equally impactful, which is far away from being true. I mean, what ACS fails to achieve is capturing the nuances of each situation. Not every multi-kill is the same. Not every gunfight tells the same story. Not every round has the same odds.

What if you got a multi-kill while holding your operator on an empty bombsite? According to ACS you have done one of the best plays you could do to your team. But at the end of the day you did not impact the odds of winning that round, since the bomb was already going to explode with or without your flashy multi-kill.

By saying this i‚Äôm not trying to bash on that metric and I totally understand that Riot wanted to have at least a placeholder. After all, having a score system is better than having no score system, isn‚Äôt?

Who knows in the future we can have keep improving on this and implement better metrics for non-duelist agents? Let‚Äôs give Caesar what belongs to Caesar :)

Final impact table of that icebox match

Final scoreboard

Final scoreboard above. We all know sage players have a hard time on Icebox. Look at how SicK went from bottom to 2nd place, climbing up +3 positions! As much as he had the worst KDA in the whole team (11/14), his 11 kills were impactful. After all, that is what should matter in a Valorant match.

Getting the rounds where at a given moment the minimum probability of winning a round was low but that team ended up winning it anyway. Let‚Äôs look at round 6

title: Tips For Better Abdominal Health: Vijaya, Ayurveda & More
text:
Abdominal health is the cornerstone of the body to function optimally since the abdomen is the region that contains the body‚Äôs digestive organs. And today, a vast majority of digestive issues and abdominal health conditions are because of improper habits and accumulation and rotting of undigested food, causing conditions like

Diarrhea

Constipation

Ulcers

IBS, IBD, etc.

To improve your abdominal health and prevent such issues, Ayurveda doctors recommend certain dietary and lifestyle changes along with the consumption of the potent herb Vijaya.

Because Vijaya shows robust anti-inflammatory and pain-relieving properties that help in effectively alleviating digestive disorders and their symptoms in patients and improving their overall quality of life.

Some tips for better abdominal health are as follows:

Eat Fresh Foods

Ayurveda doctors recommend including more fresh veggies and fruits in your diet. They provide the body with the necessary nutrients to improve gut health and digestion.

There are some carbohydrates that the body cannot digest and absorb easily. And undigested carbohydrates, when rotten, can cause excessive bacterial growth, abdominal pain, and gas. Adopting a low-FODMAP diet and getting the best medical consultation to know which foods will suit you the best help manage digestive issues.

Avoid Processed Foods

Processed foods are rich in:

Artificial sweeteners

Food additives

Refined carbohydrates

Trans fats

They can cause much damage to the digestive tract by producing harmful chemicals. Hence replacing them with whole foods (whole grains and fresh fruits and vegetables) instead enhances digestive health.

Furthermore, reduce consumption of fatty foods, dairy products with high-fat foods like butter and cheese, and white foods such as rice, potatoes, and white bread. These foods slow down the digestive processes.

Add More Fiber to Your Diet

Choosing whole grains over processed ones and opting for more fruits, veggies, and legumes can help you significantly improve your abdominal health. Fibers help keep the food moving through the digestive tract and alleviate conditions like constipation, diarrhea, ulcers, and IBS.

It is crucial to consume both kinds of fibers, insoluble (roughage) and soluble. The former adds bulk to the stools, and the latter absorbs water to prevent watery stools.

Consume More Pre and Probiotics

Probiotics are yeasts and healthy bacteria in the digestive tract that help combat the symptoms of stress, constipation, diarrhea, bloating, gas, and even IBS pain in people. Fermented foods are good probiotic sources that help with better nutrient digestion and absorption, like kefir, kimchee, low-fat yogurt, fermented vegetables, etc.

And prebiotics are the compounds in foods that aid the growth of these healthy gut bacteria. Some common prebiotic sources include whole grains, raw fruits, and veggies, legumes, etc.

Check Your Medications and Choose Vijaya

There are numerous prescription drugs, antibiotics, and OTC medicines for digestive issues that interfere with gut bacteria, cause harmful side effects to the system and worsen the conditions. Hence, it is best to talk to your doctors, get the best medical consultation.

Choose suitable alternatives such as Vijaya, which can help relieve several digestive problems. There is a reason why, for centuries, this herb has been used medicinally to treat digestive disorders. When people consume Vijaya, it goes into the system and binds with the cannabinoid receptors in the gut.

By doing so it activates those receptors which in turn helps enhance food intake and improve digestion. Furthermore, Vijaya significantly reduces acid secretion that is caused by increased junk food consumption today.

Not only that, because of its direct influence on the digestive system, Vijaya is very helpful in managing disorders like IBS, IBD, Ulcerative Colitis, Crohn‚Äôs Disease, etc. Patients report significant decreases in their symptoms such as abdominal pain and daily bowel movements.

Besides that, Vijaya also reduces people‚Äôs dependence on traditional prescription drugs, especially harmful and addictive opioids. What makes this herb even better is that it exhibits all these health benefits without showing any adverse side effects on health that are shown by conventional medications.

Adopt the Right Eating Habits

To improve abdominal health, it is crucial to eat the right foods the right way by adopting the following habits:

Have a fixed, regular schedule for meals to keep the digestive system healthy.

Replace frying and grilling with healthier cooking methods like steaming, stewing, microwaving, boiling, etc.

Have a sufficient gap between meals and sleep to aid digestion.

Avoid excess sweet, salty, and spicy foods.

Avoid consuming spoilt foods.

Avoid smoking, drinking alcohol, and consuming caffeinated beverages.

Don‚Äôt eat too much too quickly.

Eat the amounts your body needs, not what the taste-buds desire.

Eat slowly and chew the food properly instead of gulping. It helps properly break down the food, produce enough saliva for digestion, and digest and absorb the nutrients better.

Stay Hydrated

Drinking sufficient water is crucial for good digestive health. It helps the body break down the food and absorb the nutrients better. It further softens the stool and allows it to pass more easily through the colon, hence alleviating the chances of constipation.

Reduce Stress

Annoying deadlines and hectic workflows have caused a lot of stress in people, which has impacted digestion and caused various abdominal issues in people. Stress-reducing activities like meditation, yoga, exercise, good sleep, creative hobbies, etc., go a long way in coping with stress and keeping the abdomen healthy.

Exercise Regularly

Regular exercise helps the food move properly in the digestive tract, reduce constipation, reduce excess weight, alleviate stress, and keep you active. Hence ensure including regular exercise in your schedule after a healthy meal.

Get Sufficient Sleep

Lack of sleep can disturb the hormonal balance, causing stress and affecting your dietary choices and appetite. When tired, you might resort to fast foods to get immediate energy boosts and cause long-term damage to the system. Hence, it is important to get at least 7 hours or more sleep in a day.

References

https://www.everydayhealth.com/digestive-health/tips-for-better-digestive-health/

https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/ways-to-improve-digestion#TOC_TITLE_HDR_10

title: Cyprus: Land of love, invasions, and our first Levantine treats
text:
Amazing book a‚Äùmeh‚Äùzing wine

Armchair travelling to every country in the world is not my only grand gesture of love for our planet. The first was promising the children that I would take them to every country in Europe. We had hit country 39 (Poland) when Covid turned our travels virtual. And the very first country we visited on those real travels was Cyprus, an unforgettable, sunny island that is so well placed it has been conquered by Hittites, Egyptians, Phoenicians, Assyrians, Greeks, Persians, Macedonians, Romans, Byzantines, Arabs, Franks, Genoese, Venetians, Ottomans, Turks and British armies. The last time was in 1974, when Greek nationalists staged a coup d‚Äôetat and the Turkish retaliated by invading the North, thereby separating this island in two with a ‚Äúthin green line‚Äù between them.

This traumatic period is at the heart of this week‚Äôs novel ‚ÄúThe Island of Missing Trees‚Äù by Elif Shafak, the perfect book to go armchair travelling with. Not only does Shafak weave history into the storytelling, she also teases the tastebuds with evocative descriptions of the food and drinks that would accompany any real trip to Cyprus. It is pretty cheese and honey heavy and so we fell off the vegan wagon for this one, but as this is our first Levantine country, there is plenty of vegan food too. I tried to cook as much as possible, but couldn‚Äôt do as well as Ada‚Äôs (the main character) aunt who fixed breakfast of ‚Äúgrilled halloumi with za‚Äôatar, baked feta with honey, sesame halva, stuffed tomatoes, green olives with fennel, bread rolls with black olive spread‚Ä¶‚Äù it goes on‚Ä¶ for ages.

Vegan version of Levantine spread

The novel is part-narrated by a Fig Tree, but don‚Äôt let that put you off, it is readable and accessible and borrows heavily from the Hidden Life of Trees, and Gods Wasps and Stranglers, two of the best tree books I‚Äôve ever read.

Veggie version of Levantine spread

Whilst revelling in Shafak‚Äôs words, I gorged on honey roasted figs, honey baked feta, Greek salad, Makaoronia Tou Fournou (a Cypriot pasta bake), and anything from the Levant that I could find in the supermarket. It was easy to cook and the only complaints were that there wasn‚Äôt enough of it. This was one of those countries where you could eat a different dish every day of the armchair travelling week and still not get through the recipes.

Figs baked in honey topped with pomegranate molasses, pistachio and vegan ice-cream

But what do you wash it down with? Well, having visited five different shops looking for Greek wine, I finally found a shop that sells Cypriot wine from Keo, a brewery which seems to have a monopoly on Cypriot booze. It even owns St John Commondaria, which has been brewed the same way since the 8th Century. The only problem is that winemaking has got far, far better since then and so I am not a fan of this sweet, sweet wine, nor, if I‚Äôm honest, the Othello wine that we drank with our meal (though it got better after a few glasses!) Keo beer though, THAT I got on well with, though I guess it is similar to good quality lager the world over.

Greek Cypriot food, kinda

For our film we retuned to the 1974 war with ‚ÄúThe boy on the bridge‚Äù, which tells the story of traumas passed on to generations, coming of age in a small Cypriot village and life growing up in the 1980s. Despite the subject matter, it is slow, relaxing, and like spending a couple of hours experiencing village life. There are twists, there are turns, there is a parrot (just as there is in The Island of Missing Trees) and there are no mobile phones. What more could anyone ask for?

The world is a wonderful place

Cyprus is also the home of Aphrodite, the Goddess of love, beauty and sexuality so you would have thought that it would also be an island of love songs, and maybe it is, it is hard to tell what they are singing about in the excellent Music of Cyprus: it could be love, or God, or death, or war, or losing their favourite jumper in a nightclub, but it is certainly emotive and I should maybe had started by recommending that you listen to it whilst you read the blog, which is now done, until next week, when we visit Czechia!

title: WarcraftNFT: Gamefi+Defi+NFT
text:
WarcraftNFT: Gamefi+Defi+NFT

World of Warcraft NFT is committed to building a sustainable and decentralized entertainment ecosystem with users as the center. World Of Warcraft NFT Dec 31, 2021¬∑2 min read

World of Warcraft is a meta-universe chain game with the theme of Play to earn. It adds the model and story elements of ‚ÄúWorld of Wracraft‚Äù, supports PVE tower defense mission mode and PVP player battle mode, and adds level system, Rune system, guild reward system, players can obtain corresponding game token rewards by exploring all aspects of the game.

In the game, players can summon three heroes: Terran, Orc and night elf. Humans produce meat (WWF), beasts produce wood (WWW), and night elves produce gold (WWG).

Players to participate in the game first select the PVE level, and then select the heroes to fight. After passing the level, the corresponding token rewards can be obtained. The rewards are determined by the hero‚Äôs attribute and level, the level‚Äôs income coefficient, and the rune bonus coefficient.

For example, if you play a wood hero, you will get WWW token rewards corresponding to the wood hero when you clear the game.

For example, if you play a meat hero and a wood hero, you will get WWF and

WWW token rewards corresponding to the meat hero and wood hero.

The attributes of the heroes chosen to fight are different, and the reward

tokens obtained through PVE missions are also different.

The higher the level of heroes you play, the more reward tokens you will

get through the level.The higher the level of the level you choose to pass, the higher the reward coefficient is. The higher the level and number of runes worn, the higher the reward coefficient‚Ä¶

title: Referral Sharing Mechanism
text:
Conditions for referrers:

Anyone with an invitation link can become a referrer. If a referrer has at least one NFT in his/her account, the referrer will have a share of the referral earning.

The bond between referrer and referee is valid for a period of 30 days (during this period if the referrer‚Äôs account has less than one NFT, no earning from referrals will be given but the bond between the referrer and referee will remain valid).

Referral earnings are as described below:

When a referee buys a mystery box in the marketplace using SEA tokens, 5.75% of the total transaction amount, as well as 7% of the platform fee (4.25%) charged by the platform, will be given to the referrer.

For example: If a referee spends 1500 SEA to purchase three mystery boxes, then his/her referrer can get: 1500*5.75%+1500*4.25%*7%=90.7125 $SEA

2. When a referee makes purchases via C2C, 7% of the platform fee (4.25%) charged by the platform will be given to the referrer.

For example: If a referee made purchases via C2C in the total amount of 3 BNB, then his/her referrer can get: 3*4.25%*7%=0.008925 BNB

3. A referee will contribute promotion points to their referrer for all purchases made in the marketplace. The top 500 referrers ranked by the total number of promotion points during the season will be rewarded a referrer bonus.

Platform fee includes purchase shark NFTs through using $SEA on StarSharks official website and the C2C transactions on marketplace all at a rate of 4.25%, of which the distribution is outlined below;

1% allocated for agency rewards, 2% allocated for guild rewards. 7% allocated for referral earning which will remain valid for 30 days; upon expiry, SEA will be burned and BNB will be put into the staking pool. 70% will be allocated to the staking pool. 20% will be allocated as the platform‚Äôs revenue.

Noted: When the referrer/agency/guild does not meet the referral conditions, SEA will be burned and BNB will be put into the staking pool.

Breakdown of the distribution of SEA earnings:

a. 90% Burned;

b. 5.75% Referrer;

c. 4.25% Platform fee:

20% goes to the platform revenue

3% goes to the guild

7% goes to the referrer

70% is burned

500*4.25%*20%=4.25 SEA to the platform revenue

495.75 Burned

All $SEA Token earnings for referrers will be calculated at the end of the month. Because there was no affiliation in December, the relevant $SEA are burned. The earning from referrals will start in January.

title: E-sports on the rise; youth sports suffer
text:
As the sports world is once again colliding with Covid-19, thanks to the Omicron variant, I could not help but notice a recent story in the NY Times‚Äô sports section. It dealt with the rise in E-sports and focused on a family in Texas. E-sports is growing in popularity, helped by the pandemic, when sports activities were curtailed and youth turned to other interests.

The piece is particularly interesting because the parents of the two boys who were the main subjects in the story, did not want their kids playing football. Mind you, this is in football-mad Texas, where the high school football season just ended this past weekend. The parents felt football was too dangerous.

As the story mentioned, youth participation in sports was dropping before the pandemic. The decline has accelerated, as the pandemic continues. This quote by Dr. Travis E. Dorsch, associate professor and founding director of the Families in Sport Lab at Utah State University, is especially telling:

‚ÄúThere is a lot more stuff competing for the attention of young people ‚Äî E-sports is a big one. As kids get older, there is more tug at them academically and socially. We‚Äôre seeing a lot of dropouts. This creates a reckoning for youth sports.‚Äù

No question youth sports is at a crossroads. As kids become more adept at playing E-sports, where being all thumbs can be a plus rather than a curse, organizers of youth sports are more concerned they may become part of a bygone era. Professional sports leagues and collegiate sports are also watching the trend.

The University of Michigan, where football is king, is offering scholarships to E-sports participants. An expert in E-Sports can compete for millions in prize money. The possibilities are endless.

The day may come when more people are watching an E-Sports event on You Tube, Twitch or television than the World Series. Think I‚Äôm kidding? Many E-sports channels on You Tube consistently draw hundreds of thousands of views. It is safe to say E-sports is more than a fad. In fact, it has the lasting power of a new generation, prepared to relegate the sports landscape on which older generations were weened to the sidelines.

title: Let‚Äôs Look at December 14
text:
America has entered a time when major news agencies will divulge only what they want to divulge. It must fit their narrative, or they simply cannot report on it.

December 14th has a major significance because it is the day that the COVID vaccines were distributed and given for the first time to patients. COVID had dominated the airways for the last 9 months. It was the number topic of all news agencies. December 14th was also the day that my wife and I were traveling up to Kansas from Texas to see our two sons that lived up there. It was our only chance to see our oldest son as we were not going to see him for Christmas.

So, as we drive up to Kansas, somewhere at the top of Oklahoma, the wife and I switch out driving. That is the time I get to see what the internet has to tell me. You know, what the news agencies want me to know. At least once a day I do venture over to CNN, to view what they call news. Of course, they did not let my expectation down whatsoever. It was around 3 pm, and the top 5 stories that CNN thought were the most important for the day for all viewers to read about surprised me. For nowhere in the top 5 stories was a word about COVID vaccine distribution. I was completely dumbfounded, in fact I screened shot each story in disbelief.

The top story that was important for all America to drop everything to read was titled, ‚ÄúCongressman leaves GOP, blasts Trump and party leaders.‚Äù Now as I read this, regardless of which party switched to what, this happens in every Presidency, this to be honest on the grand scheme of things, is at best, this is a story that is in lower portion of the top 20 stories of the day. If CNN, were a paper it would be right before the classified ads. But CNN felt it was the most important, ok maybe they put COVID vaccine distribution as number two. You know a vaccine that was produced in less than a year and will get out to all of America. Not a chance.

The second top story from CNN on the day COVID-19 vaccine was released was titled, ‚ÄúCOVID-19 now kills more than 1 American every minute. And the rate keeps accelerating.‚Äù Now that does hint on COVID-19 but is not about the vaccine instead it is showing some data to produce fear amongst its viewers. You know a technique that says, ‚Äústay tuned to us because only CNN can scare the heck out of you.‚Äù

The third most important story from CNN on December 14 thwas, ‚ÄúGupta pressures Azar on White House parties: How are we supposed to reconcile this?‚Äù Really, if this were a paper it would be back in the ‚Äúfor sale‚Äù section of the paper. This is really, more important than the monumental feat of developing a vaccine, going through trial and error, getting it to pass the FDA, and then distributing it throughout the United States properly. Yep, deep down in my heart, I really wanted to know all about this article. An article that gave a futile attempt to paint the White House in less light instead of taking the opportunity to inform America.

The fourth most important story from CNN is ‚ÄúLIVE Updates: America‚Äôs electors cast their votes.‚Äù Then it has a photo of the Clintons casting. Like they have any relevance left. I do not mind the LIVE update of this due to the election just recently happened but not sure why a photo of the Clinton‚Äôs would be put on there. Do not get me wrong, Bill was the 42 ndPresident. Ok I got that. Hillary was just another person that did not become President, plain and simple. No relevance here, except she finally gets a little good feeling payback in 2020 after not getting over losing the election in 2016 to an amateur politician, for the last four years. I am waiting for her memoirs to be released in 2030 called, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm still not over 2016 by HRC.‚Äù

Then we have the fifth most important story from CNN, ‚ÄúWhy the Electoral College has long been controversial?‚Äù This is a story that runs after every election. In a paper it would be a prelude to the classified section. But CNN ordained it to be the fifth most important story in America, way above the fact that the COVID vaccine was already being distributed and administered earlier this day.

Just to demonstrate that news must fit an agenda, I‚Äôll even cover their sixth most important story of the day. This story, ‚Äúeven after getting a COVID vaccine, you should still wear a mask. Here‚Äôs why-and for how long?‚Äù Yep, hey you guys, we still got to make sure we show we are controlling you, so let us push an article saying that you still got to wear a mask. Got to keep the mask making business going. More importantly CNN felt the need to taint the confidence in people taking the vaccine. You know, make sure you wear that mask, you never know.

So, this is my thoughts and other thoughts may vary but I would suggest that CNN is a little lopsided in their reporting. Basically, it is more important for CNN to feed you their agenda instead of simply reporting the news. You remember when that is what news agencies did. Today our expectation is still the same, just CNN does not meet our expectation.

I am just asking the viewer of CNN, ‚ÄúDoesn‚Äôt America Deserve Better‚Äù reporting, just simply asking for America????????

title: Hotel Owner‚Äôs Protection Against Hackers Strikes | Hotel Marketing
text:
Hotel Owner‚Äôs Protection Against Hackers Strikes | Hotel Marketing

#HotelMarketing #BeatTheCompetition #Bezla Bezla.com

No matter where you are on your hotel revenue journey, Bezla can help you go further.

Bezla.com LLC

Website: https://Bezla.com

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/bezla

Phone: +1‚Äì888‚Äì999‚Äì8086

1800 JFK Blvd Suite 300 PMB 91649

Philadelphia, PA 19103

- ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî ‚Äî -

Hackers‚Äô theft of confidential data is a significant threat to businesses worldwide, including the hotel industry, without a doubt. Hoteliers stay powerless to hackers aiming to sensitive and confidential data such as guests‚Äô credit card information and employees‚Äô private details. During a hotel breach, hackers followed a ransom payment after assuming the hotel‚Äôs technology instead of pursuing personal data.

During a conference, there was a discussion on how cybersecurity affects the industry. One significant thing indicated that hotels should look at hackers‚Äô physical damage potential. Potential targets can be guest data systems and life and safety systems such as HVAC (heating, ventilation, air conditioning), elevators, electricity, and the like. Financial theft affects property and stature, but a breach of its physical arrangement could also cause it to shut down.

A discussion then turned to a European property that had its systems frozen by hackers resulting in its complete hotel computer shutdown. It suffered two cyberattacks, but this time, the hackers breached the hotel‚Äôs keycard system, making it impossible for guests to enter their rooms and stop card reprogramming.

The hackers asked for a sum of money to return the keycard system and room locks control. The administration, wholly occupied with the winter season, preferred to settle the ransom instead of finding a resolution.

The situation could have been more threatening as the entry point remains open once breached until removed. Luckily, the property took the precaution to mend a backdoor the hackers left and sealed their systems.

Within two years, there was a breach in every significant hotel property. Hackers stuck point-of-sale systems intending to get personal information. However, it is the first case where the hackers endangered the guests‚Äô safety which was more concerning.

Hotels rely on intricate overlaying and joining computer systems. Acquiring entry to a system permits hackers to access other spots and presents chances. Moreover, hotel owners and operators should be cautious of ransomware which is becoming more popular nowadays. It gives the hacker a more or less quick return rather than selling private information because its value is rapidly declining. Additionally, they now tend to know the property‚Äôs susceptibility leaving a backdoor to target properties numerous times.

Here are recommended actions hotels should take to attain data security:

1. Examine the threat and the risk. Businesses differ, and each must determine the risks it is ready to handle and offset the other hazards. Evaluate disconnecting systems such as preventing the key card system from accessing the hotel‚Äôs website and preparing for workarounds. It can also consider allowing a manual system override through physical keys.



2. Train workforce. Human acts influence most data infringements, whether an error or a malicious act. We highly recommend pinpointing hazards and avoiding them through extensive workforce training to reduce cybercrime risks.

3. Strategize for the infringement. Setting up technical or workforce preemptive efforts is not enough since any system able of authorized entry is weak to unauthorized access. There will not be enough time to strategize a form of defense if and when it happens. Hotels should create and enforce trial retort strategies and keep them updated like any other business.

If we can be of assistance to your hotel marketing, please reach out to us on our website at www.bezla.com, or you can give us a call at 888‚Äì999‚Äì8086.

title: Timeshare Vs Hotel: Which is Right for Your Family?
text:
The conversation surrounding the benefits of timeshare vs hotel is always ongoing. The pros and cons of timeshares or hotels each really depend on every individual and family. Vacation styles, budget, location, frequency of travel, and length of stay are all important factors to consider. In this showdown, we weigh the difference between timeshare vs hotel when it comes to these major factors.

What exactly are the benefits of a timeshare compared to a hotel? For one, planning for vacations can be difficult, which is where a timeshare can come in handy. Vacation ownership can save you money! If you already have your lodging sorted out, then you can budget for the rest of your vacation needs. You can focus on saving for flights, vacation activities, and more. Plus, with that extra money in your pocket, you can plan on fully stocking the kitchen in your timeshare suite! So, how do you decide when it comes to timeshare versus a hotel? Weighing the pros and cons of timeshares and hotels is a great place to start.

The benefits of timeshare resorts and the accommodations they offer are the spacious, home-like units. Complete with multiple bedrooms, living areas, and complete kitchens, timeshares give owners a home away from home. What‚Äôs more, many timeshares encompass everything you could want in a vacation. With all of the incredible amenities, you might not even want to leave your resort.

In-Unit Kitchens and Dining

Unlike a hotel, timeshares have full-size kitchens, not just a microwave and mini-fridge. This is a big factor for families considering a timeshare over a hotel. If you‚Äôre just looking for a complimentary breakfast on your way out the door, maybe a hotel would be okay for you. Foodies might love exploring every dining option in the areas surrounding their hotel or resort, but sometimes a home-cooked meal just can‚Äôt be beaten. Especially when you‚Äôre traveling with a large family! Cooking in your timeshare‚Äôs kitchen some nights can be very helpful with staying within your budget.

Amenities

One of the pros of timeshare resorts that is often one of the cons of hotels is access to extensive amenities. Timeshares are designed with luxury and excitement in mind, so many have:

Spas

Multiple swimming pools, water features, lazy rivers, water slides, etc!

Amusement parks

Golf courses

Excursions

Snow skiing and water-skiing access

Casinos

Boating

Restaurants

Bars and pool-side bars

Vacation Exchange

A great thing about owning a timeshare is the chance to become a vacation exchange member. RCI (formerly Resort Condominiums International) and Interval International are two of the largest exchange companies for timeshares out there. Vacation exchange is as simple as signing up for a membership, depositing your week or points, and then swapping for a new location/week. You don‚Äôt get access to this type of vacation exchange with hotels.

As we mentioned before, timeshares come with large kitchens and living spaces. Those accommodations that come with timeshares shouldn‚Äôt be downplayed. Imagine a standard hotel room. Typically you‚Äôll have a bed, a TV, a bathroom, and maybe a small table. Now, imagine your timeshare suite being three times larger than that! On average, that‚Äôs how much larger a timeshare suite is.

Additionally, you can enjoy separate locking bedrooms for extra privacy and relaxation. Not to mention, you won‚Äôt have to worry about over-packing-timeshares often come with washers and dryers in your room so you can wash all of your clothes like you would at home. This is one of the major pros of timeshares and cons of hotels, especially if you have a family.

One of the biggest benefits of timeshares is that they can save families money. If you‚Äôre able to find a timeshare you love on the resale market, this becomes even more so. Many timeshare resales are priced lower than they are from a developer. With a timeshare, you can guarantee your family vacations for years to come. While timeshare is not an investment, if you buy a timeshare outright, you‚Äôll only then have to pay maintenance fees every year. Not to mention, there are timeshare financing options available to you.

Check Out Timeshares for Sale Now

Timeshare vs Hotel: Locations and Flexibility

When you‚Äôre looking for the pros and cons of timeshare vs hotel, location is a huge factor! When you own a timeshare, you can choose where you want to vacation from hundreds of incredible resorts. This is especially true when you own with a vacation club. The best part of being a vacation club member is the flexibility and resort locations! Each year, you are able to decide which resort you want to visit! You don‚Äôt have to stay at your ‚Äúhome resort‚Äù each year! With a vacation club, like the ones below, you are able to experience new destinations every year while still experiencing the incredible perks of owning a timeshare!

Disney Vacation Club is a great choice for the entire family. Their resorts are all within close proximity to major vacation destinations across the country. More than ten of the DVC resorts are within minutes of Walt Disney World. There are shuttles, monorails, and gondolas to transport guests straight from their accommodations to the fun. There are also DVC resorts on some of the country‚Äôs best beaches! Disney‚Äôs Hilton Head Resort will put you right in the center of the relaxing Lowcountry of South Carolina. Disney‚Äôs Aulani Resort provides guests with an authentic Hawaiian getaway, with a touch of Disney magic.

As you enter a DVC resort, you will be greeted by a cast member saying ‚Äúwelcome home!‚Äù Disney strives to make every DVC member feel right at home at their resorts and we think they really accomplish that goal. Disney Vacation Club members can submit an order form to have groceries delivered to their resort, giving you more time to spend with family and make memories.

Marriott Vacation Club is another top timeshare brand that offers beautiful resorts around the world. If you‚Äôre looking to stay in Orlando, you‚Äôre in luck! Marriott‚Äôs Cypress Harbor has that ‚ÄúOld Florida‚Äù charm about it, with gazebos, porches, and stunning pathways through the resort property. Close to all the attractions of Orlando, vacationers can also enjoy this resort, complete with full kitchens in every unit.

Marriott Vacation Club has over 50 resorts around the globe that have all of the incredible amenities that come with owning a timeshare. The difference between staying at a Marriott timeshare vs a Marriott hotel is accommodation size and sense of community. Being a Marriott Vacation Club member means that you can really experience the brand‚Äôs world-class hospitality all over the world!

Holiday Inn Club Vacations is a great option for those looking to buy a timeshare. HICV focuses on family-friendly vacations in fun destinations. If you‚Äôre looking to head to Orlando, Orange Lake Resort is a popular choice! With its winding lazy river, mini-golf, and seven restaurants, it‚Äôs clear to see why. Another great destination for family vacations is Gatlinburg, Tennessee and Smoky Mountain Resort puts you right in the center of the fun! This resort sits right at the foot of the Smokies, so guests are just minutes away from beautiful outdoor activities. Plus, there are tons of other attractions, like Dollywood, just minutes away from the resort!

Whether you want to have fun in the sun or go on an adventure in the mountains, Holiday Inn Club Vacations can provide the getaway of your dreams.

Planning Your Next Trip?

Read up on more popular vacation destinations, vacation ownership clubs, and all the inside information on all things timeshare.

title: 3 EMAIL MARKETING MISTAKES YOU NEED TO AVOID
text:
3 email marketing mistakes you need to avoid

With the evolution of marketing strategies, it‚Äôs more important than ever to come up with something that is personalized and helps you connect with your target audience without breaking the bank.

Email marketing is a marketing strategy that allows you to reach out to your old customers and score new ones, all while being easy and affordable.

Now you must think, it‚Äôs just an email, what could possibly go wrong, right? The answer : everything! There are bad email practices that can drive your customers away and waste all your effort spent on marketing. Here‚Äôs how.

Too Frequent Emails:

If your initial email marketing efforts become successful, you might get tempted to increase engagement by sending more emails, but what became the reason the customers came to you, could become the very reason they leave. Email burnout is a grave issue, and if you don‚Äôt schedule your emails with enough gap in between them, your customers will start to ignore your brand messages.

Crowded Email Content:

We cannot emphasize enough the importance of a minimalistic approach when it comes to marketing. Keep your motto ‚Äî the simpler, the better. We get it, you don‚Äôt want your customers to miss out on the amazing deals you‚Äôre offering, but putting too much content in one email will make it unattractive. Try to stick to the main message of the email and avoid bulk email messages.

Skipping Segmentation:

Let‚Äôs face it, customers are tired of generic marketing messages, and everyone doesn‚Äôt want the same offers. Not segmenting customer lists based on their past behavior, demographics and interests is a killer email marketing mistake that will drive your sales down the drain. It‚Äôs important to segment your customer lists so all your audience gets exactly what they want and not the same boring content everyone else is getting.

Email marketing in 2021 is not about working harder anymore. At Databeys, we offer email marketing automation as well as personalization, with effective list management and engaging templates to engage and retain your audience for a long time.

title: Take the Stress out of Sales with Kanban
text:
A business lives and dies by the performance of its sales team. Businesses both big and small are always looking for processes and software solutions that could simplify the job for the salespeople and make it easier for managers to keep an eye on the progress.

One of the most popular products for this very reason is CRM software. Businesses like the intuitive nature of such software which gives managers an easy view of the whole pipeline while also allowing the sales team to work more efficiently in following leads and turning opportunities into sales.

Still, CRM software has its limitations:

The process of advancing an item through the pipeline is unnecessarily long: you open a record in detail view, then edit and change the appropriate field‚Äôs value.

There is no way for a manager to gain any contextual information. In a list view with all records listed at once, it is impossible to determine how one sales item is doing relative to another, or if any of the stages in the pipeline is stalling for some reason.

You have the complete picture of how items are distributed and where each item is in relation to the other.

Kanban Boards

This is where Kanban can help. Kanban boards is an idea consisting of cards arranged in columns, with the ability to shift them around with an interactive interface. Each column can represent a key value, with the idea being that you can filter all items by an entity and group it by different values so that you have the complete picture of how items are distributed and where each item is in relation to the other.

From a CRM perspective, imagine that all your potential sales are arranged as cards in columns where each column represents a stage in the pipeline. This way, you know how many sales are in each stage as well as if one stage has more items in it compared to others.

What‚Äôs more, the salespeople can simply drag and drop a card from one column to the other, when moving an item along the pipeline. This is a contrast to having to edit a record‚Äôs field after opening it in detail view which is a tedious process, but the only way to do things in traditional CRMs. No more.

RT Dynamic Boards

Now that you‚Äôve seen what Kanban can do to enhance the CRM experience, let us tell you about the other features that we offer in our Kanban solution for SuiteCRM, Dynamic Boards.

Not only do you get the improved view which adds context to your sales, and the ability to easily progress items avoiding the drawn out process of editing fields for each record, you can also:

Mark a sale as closed won or closed lost with the same drag and drop simplicity. Set your own success and failure criteria if you don‚Äôt want to mark sales closed right away. See important information such as account name, assignee, and value of an item directly on the card without having to look through the detail view. Interact with the concerned account or contact about the sale record from within the Kanban view, because each card has buttons for email, phone, or even to take notes or add a calendar event for that record. Have all of these features available for Opportunities, Leads, as well as Cases modules.

With such simplification of sales operations, Dynamic Boards takes the stress out of sales for the staff and allows managers to stay on top of things much more easily.

How to get Dynamic Boards for SuiteCRM

If you use SuiteCRM in your business, and would like to enjoy the advantages that Dynamic Boards offers compared to the default views of different modules, look for Dynamic Boards on Suite Store, or click here. For any queries, please contact support@rolustech.com.

title: Let‚Äôs Talk About pHUMP?
text:
We‚Äôve had many questions in our Discord that we will address with articles like this one as well as upcoming community calls. Today we‚Äôre going to talk about pHUMP and its importance to Whale.Loans.

Overview

pHUMP is to Whale.Loans what pOHM is to Olympus DAO. It was the token given out during our private sale. Our private round was for partners who aligned with our vision and are willing to help us successfully achieve our goals. This money was raised for things like audits, development, marketing and things like that. So we would like to issue a special thank you to Impossible Finance, LD Capital, DeSpread, Efficient Frontier, and a handful of other individual partners.

How it works

As you know, we cannot pre-mine HUMP. So we issued pHUMP which is a derivative of HUMP. pHUMP gives the holder the option to mint HUMP by burning pHUMP and providing the intrinsic value of HUMP. For example, an investor would provide 1 BUSD and 1 pHUMP to mint 1 HUMP.

pHUMP is worth the price of HUMP minus the intrinsic value, and it only makes sense to redeem it when HUMP is above intrinsic value.

The best thing about pHUMP is that it can‚Äôt be redeemed all at once and dumped onto the market. pHUMP is vested based on supply. This creates the best incentives for all parties involved. pHUMP is vested along with supply, and are only redeemed when we trade with a positive intrinsic value. We the team, investors and advisors, don‚Äôt only want the supply to increase, or the price to go up, we want both. And so do you.

The Specifics

The team, investor, and advisors pHUMP cumulatively vest as 10.5% of HUMP supply. This means that at 1m HUMP supply, a maximum of 105k pHUMP can be redeemed. At 10m HUMP supply, it‚Äôs 1.05m pHUMP. There‚Äôs a lot of upside for holders, but it is dependent on actual growth of the protocol.

The breakdown is as follows:

Team: 200m pHUMP and 6.5% supply

Investors: 250k pHUMP and 3% supply

Advisors: 100k pHUMP and 1% supply

Ultimately we decided on lower numbers than Olympus DAO because we were not the originators of this token design and we believe we can innovate and build a scalable ecosystem with less.

The Plan

These funds and resources will be used to support and build out our ecosystem. The treasury will be completely separate and will never be used for business purposes such as marketing or salaries.

In the near future, our focus will be on increasing usability. Our ultimate goal will be to onboard a user into any of our products in 1‚Äì3 clicks. We are also working on gas optimizations to help users save on gas fees. Most importantly, we want to focus on security for users as well as the protocol so creating products with insurance baked into them for user protection is a top priority. Also, in addition to regular audits we‚Äôll be creating a bug bounty program as a serious measure of protocol safety. These things must be done first before we roll out additional products. Over the next couple of articles we are going to talk more about current and future products and infrastructure that will shape our ecosystem. To stay update on our launch, news and announcements visit:

Website: https://whale.loans

Discord: https://discord.com/rFzNx4wRtK

Twitter: https://twitter.com/whaleloans

title: BLOCWARS Breaks the Ice with its First Meme Contest Starting on the 4th of Jan.!
text:
BLOCWARS Breaks the Ice with its First Meme Contest Starting on the 4th of Jan.! BLOCWARS Dec 31, 2021¬∑2 min read

Shush!! Don‚Äôt tell Onimaru about the prank that awaits him!!

If you like to have fun as much as we do, we bet your phone library has at least a couple of memes ready to pop up in case the situation requires it. Let‚Äôs be honest, they are the heart and soul of any fun conversation as only they possess the power of bringing life into the most boring conversations. Memes shape us and define our identity as a group, giving us things to laugh about, discuss and forge new friendships, just like Onimaru would!

We are a young and vibrant community, and we enjoy good jokes and having a great time with you. Therefore, we would like to let YOU be the maverick mastermind behind our best jokes and creative content, and let you depict Onimaru through your creative lenses, the best you can.

Creativity and fun should be the main ingredients of this challenge. However, there are a few tiny little steps you need to follow to fully qualify, but worry not, the winners will be awarded!

How to participate

Follow the BLOCWARS official Twitter.

Join the official BLOCWARS Discord server.

Post your memes on Twitter alongside the @BLOCWARS tag.

Fill in the form in the official Discord server and upload your work.

Ahem..ahem, we didn‚Äôt forget about the rewards! As for the winners, they will be the ones who have received the most votes by the end of the voting period. Our team will choose the most weird-looking of them for an extra award. Also, the top 10 most voted memes will be converted into our official channel memes!

But read until the end if you want to find an extra surprise!

Voting and timeline

The voting process will take place in our official Discord channel under the dedicated competition section. You will have to head over there and give scores to your favourite meme (or memes).

We will start collecting meme works on the 4th of January and close on the 14th of January at 12:00 PM UTC.

What you can win

The most voted meme will win $100.

The top 3 most voted memes will receive one Onimaru Bad Kid mystery box each.

The weirdest meme selected by the team will also receive $100.

The top most voted 10 memes will be selected to be the BLOCWARS‚Äô official Discord memes.

Surprise! We will draw 10 whitelist names amongst the participants, so don‚Äôt shy away from submitting your creative works to us!

More details about rules and rewards will be announced later with our community, so stay tuned!

Our Social Media Channels

TwitterÔºöhttps://twitter.com/blocwars

MediumÔºöhttps://blocwars.medium.com

TelegramÔºöhttps://t.me/BLOCWARS

Discord: https://discord.com/blocwars

title: FNDZ staking on Ferrum
text:
FNDZ is teaming up with Ferrum to offer our holders a web-based staking service which allows you to stake your FNDZ tokens for constant time-based returns based on the duration of your staking commitment. In other words, the longer you stake, the higher the rewards.

We will be opening a new staking pool on 1st Jan 2022 at 11am UTC

FNDZ Staking Terms

Full maturity: 90 days

Full Rewards: 14% APR annualized

Early withdrawal: 60 days

Early withdrawal: 8% APR annualized

No Minimum, MAX stake allowed 150000 $FNDZ

Pool size: 7 million $FNDZ

Contribution window opens on 1st Jan 2022 at 11am UTC

Contribution window closes on 8th Jan 2021 at 11am UTC if pool is not filled before then

The option to unstake will open up in 90 days (full maturity), with early withdrawal after 60 days. The APR will be reduced to 8% in the FNDZ Staking pool should you choose to remove your tokens before the full 90 days of the staking pool term.

Staking $FNDZ Through Ferrum‚Äôs Flexible White Glove Staking Service

With the emergence of DeFi and the appeal of passive income, staking has taken on a fresh new relevance. Unfortunately, DeFi staking has been chiefly reserved for big-cap projects with mainnet, leaving hundreds of exciting new projects with few flexible options to offer staking and liquidity farming for their token.

This gap in the market is why Ferrum built their flexible DeFi Staking Platform. Participants lock their tokens and earn high yields based on the length of time staked. It‚Äôs like a decentralized high-yield bank account, with maximum customization for projects and flexibility for participants!

Thanks to the flexibility offered by Ferrum Network solutions, FNDZ will be able to launch its Staking program, which will help to increase their token utility while rewarding community supporters and their early investors.

If you are new to Staking, we have a handy guide below.

A step-by-step guide to staking FNDZ:

Download and install an Ethereum web3 compatible wallet, such as MetaMask. Because Metamask is the most widely adopted wallet, we‚Äôll use it for this staking tutorial.

Add Binance smart chain to your MetaMask. Then import the FNDZ token contract address by clicking ‚ÄòAdd Token‚Äô in your MetaMask wallet. This is the contract address ‚Äî 0x7754c0584372D29510C019136220f91e25a8f706

Deposit FNDZ into your MetaMask (plus enough BNB to pay for gas fees). If you need help with getting FNDZ, visit our ‚ÄòHow to buy‚Äô guide.

Next, go to our staking website

Select the FNDZ Staking pool you would like to contribute to and press ‚ÄúStake‚Äù (when it opens).

After you‚Äôve clicked on ‚ÄúStake‚Äù, the MetaMask pop-up notification will open. Click ‚Äúconfirm‚Äù at the bottom of the menu to connect to the staking smart contract.

When you are ready to stake, press ‚ÄúStake‚Äù.

This will take you to a new page. First, read and understand the disclaimer and then, if you are happy, agree to the terms.

Next, input the amount of FNDZ you wish to stake.

Then confirm the amount is correct and approve the allocation.

Allow MetaMask to spend your FNDZ (i.e. send your FNDZ to the staking contract) and press ‚Äúconfirm‚Äù.

IMPORTANT NOTE ON TRANSACTION FEES : You can edit the BSC Network gas fee in MetaMask by pressing ‚Äúedit‚Äù and choosing a custom gas fee. Note that lower fees have slower transaction times (this is optional as the bsc network is faster and cheaper than Ethereum).

: You can edit the BSC Network gas fee in MetaMask by pressing ‚Äúedit‚Äù and choosing a custom gas fee. Note that lower fees have slower transaction times (this is optional as the bsc network is faster and cheaper than Ethereum). Next, confirm your staking transaction is accurate and press ‚Äúsubmit‚Äù.

MetaMask will pop up. Confirm your transaction in MetaMask, and remember to edit the gas fee if you wish to change the increase or decrease transaction speeds.

Finally, wait until the transaction goes through (see countdown on the right hand corner of the page), and after a few seconds your stake should be confirmed!

If you have further questions, please drop into our Telegram group chat where our official FNDZ Admins will be glad to assist you.

As always, thank you all for your support, and happy staking!

The FNDZ Team

FNDZ ‚Äî Social Media

Website | Telegram |Announcements | Twitter | YouTube | Discord | Medium | Reddit | Instagram | Github

title: What Is Content Writing? Tips To Create The Best Online Content
text:
The process of receiving payments for your products or services online requires thorough planning, integration, and implementation to ensure a seamless payment process for your users and make sure that you are incurring the lowest charges from the payment gateway yourself. In addition, the privacy and safety of your buyers will be essential if you want to guarantee that your business is going to be a success. These factors make it crucial to hire the right mobile app development company in Dubai or web development company in Dubai to build your E-commerce platform.

Therefore, you need to take your time with the selection process to guarantee that you are choosing the right payment gateway for your mobile apps or web application. In this blog, we will be talking about your options and the main factors you would need to consider when selecting the payment gateway for your platform.

Some of the most popular payment gateways in the middle east include:

We mention these payment gateway providers because they are some of the most popular ones in the middle east and have proven to provide a good service. Nevertheless, we will be looking into several essential factors that will be essential for your decision regarding E-commerce payment options.

What should you be looking for when selecting your payment gateway?

Before we get into the details on what you should consider when making a decision, you need to remember that a payment gateway is a software application that helps process credit card information and enables online payments.

This means that the payment gateway requires a certain level of security with practical features to be a viable option. Deciding which gateway to use is something as relevant as choosing your E-commerce website development company.

With that said, now we can go over the main reasons and the primary considerations to keep in mind when selecting the right kind of payment gateway service. You should make sure that either of the options you consider will provide these essential features.

The main features and services to expect include:

Optimal security standards and certifications

Multi-currency support

Simple and intuitive checkout process

Easy process of integration

Customer service availability

Accessible prices and free estimates

Optimal security standards and certifications

There has never been anything more important for E-commerce than enhanced security. You need to note that you will be dealing with highly confidential information provided by your customers, such as credit card numbers, addresses, contact details, etc. As such, the last thing you want is to use a payment gateway that is not taking all required precautions and measures to secure your client‚Äôs data.

The certifications that a payment gateway requires include the Payment Card Industry (PCI) standard accreditation, which is a mandate by credit card brands. This means that without this certification, the payment gateway will not be able to operate with most credit card brands.

Any web development company in Dubai that you work with would advise you to ensure that the security measures taken by the payment processing service are optimal. This is expected when an E-commerce website development company starts to work with you on any E-commerce project.

Multi-currency support

Another critical factor that needs to be mentioned here is the currency support that various payment gateways offer. This is a crucial point to consider while selecting the right payment gateway partner for your platform, as it would directly impact your costs. If you plan to take your E-commerce business to various countries, you must keep in mind that users usually prefer to purchase products in their local currency. It is proven through a study conducted by Penton Research and E4X, where it was found that at least one-third of the users showed a reluctance to purchase when the E-commerce platform was tailored to a single currency. They either abandoned their shopping cart, bought fewer products, or left the E-commerce site to check for conversion rates and never returned.

Even if you decided to go ahead with a single currency like USD, you must be mindful of the additional charges your users would incur while making a purchase and the charges you would incur through your bank for the frequent conversions. This could lead to a bad experience for your users and must be addressed at the beginning.

The simple and intuitive checkout process

It may seem like the checkout process for a payment getaway is always going to be simple, but there are many cases when it can be confusing and frustrating for the customer. The biggest issue when this happens is that many potential buyers could end up abandoning their shopping carts before checking out if they get frustrated with the process.

Easy process of integration

Sometimes the biggest issue with a payment gateway is that they may have a highly complex integration process due to a lack of proper documentation. Proper documentation for any payment gateway is essential for your web development partner to integrate the payment gateway with your E-commerce platform. This can lead to additional development efforts spent by your web development agency to troubleshoot and integrate the necessary features of the payment gateway and thereby increase the overall cost of your E-commerce platform.

The less complicated the integration, the easier it is for any mobile app development company in Dubai to help you with the process. This also means that the development costs are going to be much lower.

Customer Service Availability

The reliability and availability of a customer service department with any payment gateway vendor are going to be essential features. You don‚Äôt want to be in a situation requiring immediate attention only to find that the payment gateway service is only available at certain hours or days of the week.

Customer service should be available at all times when it comes to a service like E-commerce. You need to consider this a critical factor while deciding the best payment gateway vendor for your E-commerce website.

Transparent pricing

There are many payment gateways services available in the market, and it is important to have relevant details regarding their terms, conditions, and pricing readily available to ensure you are making an informed decision regarding your payment gateway partner for your E-commerce platform.

Our services include professional payment gateway consultation.

We at Innobayt, can help you choose the best payment gateway option based on your business model, target market, etc. and develop your mobile or web application at competitive prices. We have enormous experience when it comes to web development and mobile app development, and this is the reason why we have become a respected E-commerce website development company in Dubai.

There are several things that you need to keep in mind when starting an E-commerce business with a web application or mobile application. Always remember that hiring a quality mobile app development company in Dubai is going to help you to ease the entire process as they would come with relevant suggestions or ideas that could save you valuable time and thereby increase your speed to market.

This is why you can rely on us to be the partner you need to succeed with your business!

How Can We Help!

Innobayt is the home of innovation where your desired ideas are transformed into designs, software, and applications! Right from logo designs to reality apps, we deliver quality work.

Our services range from building and offering stunning website designs, web application development, IoT software, and mobile app development, social media marketing (SMM), Google Ads, Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and more.

Originally published at https://recentlyheard.com on December 28, 2021.

title: Trade Show Marketing with The VIDEO Business
text:
Trade Show Marketing with The VIDEO Business

Lisa Lyttle here with The VIDEO Business. Let‚Äôs talk about trade show marketing. Now that the world is slowly opening up, trade shows are back, and I‚Äôm sure you are eager to be part of them!

You‚Äôve invested a lot of time, effort and money into your trade show booth but are you really getting everything you can out of it? Are you handing out brochures at the show and relying solely on your sales staff to chase potential clients down and explain to them who you are and what you do? And I can almost bet, that there‚Äôs a number of occasions in the past, where you‚Äôve come back from a show and you wish you had a greater impact.

Well I‚Äôve got a super easy solution for you, what you need is a video at your trade show booth explaining who you are and what you do.

An explainer video is powerful BEFORE, DURING and AFTER your trade show event. You‚Äôre able to tell your story to a maximum number of people in the shortest amount of time possible and your video can be understood with or without sound, just by the graphics that it‚Äôs displaying on the screen. So while your prospects are walking down the isles towards your booth, they can watch your video and by the time they get to your booth, they‚Äôll already have a good idea of what you have to offer. This makes it super easy for your sales staff to answer any questions they have when they arrive at your booth and to explain a little bit further.

After your event, share your video across multiple social media platforms like LinkedIn or YouTube. Put it on your company homepage, so it‚Äôs the very first thing anyone will see when they visit your website. Present your video during sales meetings, add it to your email signature and send it out to everyone that has visited your trade show booth‚Ä¶it‚Äôs a friendly, gentle reminder of who you are and how you can help them.

In these days, everything is going video, no one wants to spend their time reading long-winded sales copy about something they‚Äôre not even sure if they need. Let me help you create a short, engaging and entertaining video that will help you explain your products and services to the world.

If you need help creating a powerful, entertaining and memorable video for your business, contact me today and let‚Äôs chat.

Lisa Lyttle | Founder

The VIDEO Business

lisa@thevideobusiness.com
